Taking a slower bite, the salty flavor of the food bothered him. Eating at the slower pace, Naruto didn’t price his Adam’s apple slowly vanish. The fact that his lips slowly plumped out was also lost as the taste continued to perplex him.

“That was delicious~” Ageha was bouncing in place with her belly full. Naruto only smiled in response. “That’s nice sweetheart. Now let’s get you in the bathroom, while I clean up dinner.”

Moving quickly, Naruto took the next few minutes to draw a bath while cleaning the small mess left behind. Checking the bedroom, he saw the bath was ready. So he pulled out a clean shirt and shorts leftover from his childhood.

“Ageha, it’s time for a bath!” The shinobi called out, and the little girl came running with stuffed bear in her arms.

“Okay!” She began to strip in front of Naruto, but felt a hand stop her. Looking up, Naruto frowned a bit.

“It’s not appropriate for a girl to change in front of another person. Especially a boy,” he said with a warning tone.

Ageha was confused by the tone Naruto took. “But, __________.”
111332222222111121.title: Continue (Slower changes)

1113322222221111211.content:
“You’ve always been a girl! Most people just assume that you’re a boy since you look a bit like both,” Ageha finished, beaming with pride at her reasoning.

Naruto, however, felt a sudden dread as a strange sensation made them go rigid.

SLURP!!!

Or rather her. As her new insides rearranged themselves to compensate, her legs and arms lost and distributed muscle and fat throughout the body. As her nipples darkened and pushed out, the pectoral area hardly pushed out and was covered in wraps. His waist inclined slightly, leaving an androgynous appearance. Finally, her face turned slightly more feminine as eyes widened a bit with longer eyelashes.

Looking conflicted at her new appearance, Naruto’s body went on autopilot as she led Ageha to the bath. When she really felt in control again, she found herself naked in the tub with Ageha. The little girl splashed about while just stared.

‘This isn’t right. This girl ... my ... sister, can’t be right about this!?’

Wait. Her sister!?

Naruto began to wash Ageha as the transformation further altered her mind. ‘Of course she’s my sister. I mean, not yet. But she will be. Just need to talk to Tsunade-baaaa-sama about adoption tomorrow.’

As she washed herself and Ageha off, it wasn’t only the grime that came off. The minuscule amounts of hair and rough skin turned smooth, leaving a pale sheen instead. Shampooing both of their hairs influenced it to lay flat and reach her neck, while rubbing it in caused her nails to grow slightly.

Getting out of the tub, the drying off didn’t leave many changes. It just left her nipples slightly puffier.

Dressing Ageha in her smaller kids clothes, Naruto just changed into her usual attire. Laying out a pillow and large blanket, she began tucking Ageha in.

“Good night, my little imouto,” she cooed to the little girl.

“Good night, onee-chan!” she chirped back.

Turning off the lights, Naruto went to sleep early to prepare for tomorrow.
1113322222221111211.title: You are a girl. (Major changes)

11133222222211112111.content:
BOOM!

A loud thunderstorm hit the village around midnight. And Ageha was scared! It reminded her of being left out in the streets as cold rain chilled her to the bone.

BOOM!

Seeing a bunch of moving shadows, her fear was too much! She ran as quickly as she could to Naruto’s room, practically ripping the door open.

“Help me! I’m scared!” She nearly hopped on the bed.

Naruto groggily opened her eyes, staring at Ageha. “Mmph ... what’s wrong sweetie?”

“There’s a big boom! Loud lights! Scary shadows!” She said while shaking.

Looking at her, Naruto just shook her head. “It’s a storm dear. Nothing bad is going to happen. Go back to sleep,” she yawned while getting ready to settle back in.

“No! The monsters are gonna get me!” Ageha pleaded.

Looking up once more, Naruto saw the same scared face from earlier in the day. “Okay then. Climb up into bed with me, and no monsters will get you. Okay?”

“Promise?”

“Promise.”

Ageha then did as she was told. Slipping into the bed, Ageha scooted closer in. Wrapping her arms around Naruto’s neck, she lay her head on her chest.

“Love you okaa-chan.”

“... love you too, sweetie.”

And the last of the transformation began. Her height grew to a modest 5’6” as her legs gained supple fat and muscle. Her waist curved inward as her thighs and ass grew wider and plump, giving the definition of an hourglass figure. Her puffy chest swelled out as fat gathered, pushing out to a firm E-cup. Her face matured as her hair grew out and settled towards her now heart-shaped derrière, bangs cupping and framing her face.

Ageha simply hugged her closer, as the new woman subconsciously wrapped her hands around her new daughter. The apartment began to shift as the final changes settled into Konoha proper.

What happens next?
11133222222211112111.title: During the night

111332222222111121111.content:
Waking up, Naruto stretches herself awake for another day. And felt two large lumps jiggling with her every move. Twin emotions of shock and horror took hold as she looked frantically around the room. Four white walls greeted her, a vanity and large drawer occupied the room besides the bed.

And speaking of vanity.

A beautiful twenty-something greeted her sight. Smoky red eyes framed by long purple hair. A body most women would kill for clad in a tight pink nightie further emphasizing her feminine mystique. And Ageha hanging on to her neck.

“Good morning, okaa-Chan!”

And with that greeting, any possibility of reclaiming her former identity of Uzumaki Naruto died. A brief mindblank greeted the woman, before reality overwrote and reasserted her new name.

Tsubaki Watanabe.

An assistant to a civilian councilmen by day, a flirtatious hostess for shinobi by night. She was somewhat serious about her day career, but often cut loose during evening gigs. Despite being a particularly popular host by many, she didn’t sleep around as often as some would claim. But often, many wanted to believe her an easy lay, including her civilian boss.

Despite this, she was a kind woman who often donated to the local orphanage. But, she wanted more from life.

So she decided yesterday to adopt little Ageha after encountering her. Ageha Watanabe. Sounded right to her.

“Good morning, musume.”
111332222222111121111.title: Morning (Final mental change)

1113322222221111211111.content:
Making a quick breakfast, Tsubaki eased Ageha into the bath while dressing herself in a strapless purple dress and cardigan. Putting on a simple necklace with a sapphire jewel in the center, she called to Ageha, “Come on, sweetie! It’s time to go!”

Ageha ran out in a plain white sundress, clutching a new bear to her side. “Ready!”

Grabbing her tan purse, she locked the door and grabbed hold of Ageha’s hand. Making their way through the crowd, Tsubaki grimaced at the looks of envy or lust coming her way. She made her way to the Hokage’s tower, greeting the secretary.

“Tsunami! How are you?”

“Oh, hello Tsubaki! And who is this little one behind you? A niece?”

Ageha hid behind Tsubaki, shyly poking her head out. “No. Her name is Ageha, and she is going to be new daughter after adoption.”

Tsunami simply smiled brightly. “Oh my god! That’s wonderful! My little Hana and her can play together when we shop!”

Bright lipstick and eye shadow painted her face, while perfume wafted to her scent. “Of course! Is the Hokage busy right now, by chance?”

“You’re in luck! It’s been a slow day, so you should get in early enough. Just have a seat wherever!”

Taking Ageha by the hand, she led her to a pair of seats. “Now remember dear, you need to be respectful towards the Hokage. Understand?”

“Yes mom!”

Tsubaki beamed down at her. “Very good.”

After a few minutes, an ANBU appeared to the duo.

“The Hokage will see you now.”

Vanishing, the ANBU appeared towards the appropriate door. Letting herself in, Tsubaki saw _____ sitting behind the desk.

Who is the Hokage?
1113322222221111211111.title: Later (The morning)

11133222222211112111112.content:
Minato Namikaze. The man who some say is the strongest living Kage in the Elemental Nations. The slayer of the Kyuubi no Yoko was many things. Including a widower due to the unfortunate passing of his girlfriend Kushina.

(Keep in mind that this is an alternate Konoha. Kushina and Minato never married because Minato had taken his training to be more important here. Thus, slightly more effective in disposing of the Kyuubi through seals.)

Looking up for his paperwork, he smiled at the two new arrivals. “Good morning ladies! What exactly brings you before me today?”

Ageha looked nervous, but a reassuring smile from Tsubaki calmed her. “Well you see Lord Hokage, it began just yesterday ...”

15 minutes later (Literally an abridged version of the story minus the transformation detail)

“... and that is why I came to you,” she finished.

Minato looked thoughtfully at the story. “Well, it is a bit unusual to go about an adoption this way. But the part about the matron has me concerned.” Turning to Ageha, he gave her a calm look as his attention turned to her. “Is what you told her true? Did the matron kick you out of the orphanage?”

Looking timidly at the man, Ageha nodded. “Y-yes! She would let some of her ‘favorite’ kids out when it was time for an a-adoption, and leave the others o-out. The o-one time a boy tried to s-stand u-up to her, h-he ... h-he... .” She trailed off as tears began to fall.

Minato walked up from his desk and placed a hand on her shoulder. Bending down to her level, Minato gave her a reassuring smile. “Don’t be afraid little one. No one is going to do anything to you. Just take a deep breath, and tell me what happened.

Ageha sniffled a bit, but began to speak. “T-the boy ... Hiro, he get hit by the matron. T-two scary m-men came by and g-grabbed him. The m-matron told everyone t-that if anyone said a-anything, s-something bad would happen,” she finished as she began to hiccup.

Minato gave her another calm smile and patted her head. “Thank you for telling me this, young lady.” Walking to sit back down, he turned his attention back to Tsubaki. “And thank for bringing this to my attention Ms. Watanabe. I am going to have someone look into this after our meeting. As for your request for adoption, I normally do not handle such things. But in this instance, I can get the proper paperwork started immediately. It may take up to a week for this to happen, but little Ageha can still stay with you until then.”

Tsubaki gave him bright smile in response. “That is very generous of you Lord Hokage! I would appreciate any help you can give me!”

Minato simply waved off the praise, blushing at the praise. “It’s no problem at all! Investigating this grievous allegations means Konoha can end this potential exploitation of children quickly.”
Gesturing towards the door, he continued on. “If that’s all you require of me, I will get the process started with the end of this meeting.”

Tsubaki inclined her head in gratitude. “Yes. That is all we came for. Thank you for taking the time to help me with this issue Lord Hokage.”

Ageha, having calmed down, looked up at the village leader. “Will my friends be okay? I don’t want them getting hurt because I told!”

“No, young lady. If all is what you say it is, I’ll make sure they stay safe,” he swore as he stood up to show them out.

“Pinky promise?”

“Pinky promise,” he said as he picked the little girl up, wrapping a large pinky around her much smaller digit.

Tsubaki only smiled at the scene, enjoying that her little girl was giggling at the Hokage’s antics.

Handing Ageha over to Tsubaki, he opened the door to show them out. “I‘ll send a messager with the adoption forms within the week, Ms. Watanabe. Until then, enjoy the rest of your day.”

Nodding in response, Tsubaki walked out of the office. Making her way out of the tower, she briefly waved to Tsunami as she made her way out the tower.
11133222222211112111112.title: Minato Namikaze

1113322222221112.content:
Naruto decided to take the main street. Without access to his chakra he decided it was safer in the crowd.

He made it through with little trouble until he heard a commotion. "Watch where your looking brat", an angry voice shouted, "Didn't your parents teach you better." The other, which Naruto assumed to be a child, attempted to apologize, "I'm sorry. It was an accident. I didn't mean to." Naruto saw an angry man shouting at the child.

He decided to step in, "Hey, what's going on?" The man glared at Naruto, "This brat destroyed my produce." Naruto turned to the scared child and made eye contact with her. The girls pleading eyes made Naruto feel like he needed to protect her. He felt an unusual connection with the child.

He ignored the man and asked the child, "What's your name? "I'm Emiko" While he was talking Naruto's voice took on a softer tone, and without thinking Naruto said, "A fitting name for such a beautiful child." Emiko blushed at the compliment. Naruto shook of his confusion and asked, "What are doing in the street alone? Where are you Parents?" The girl answered "I'm looking for my mom. I thought I could find her." Naruto said, "Don't you worry. I promise to find your mother."

The man spoke up, "What about me? That little brat wrecked my stuff." Naruto was indignant, but contrary to his usual self he didn't shout, but scolded the man like a parent protecting their child. "She's just a child. How dare treat her so poorly. She only wants her mother." The mans rage faded, but he didn't let the matter drop. "My shop is still damaged someone needs to take responsibility." Naruto let out an exasperated sigh, "Fine, I'll pay for the damages so we can forget this." He reached for his bag to retrieve his wallet, but it dropped to the ground. His bag changed into a leather purse with shoulder strap, and his wallet became flat and rectangular and was decorated with a flower print. For a moment Naruto knew something was wrong, until he felt disoriented. When he regained his bearings Naruto didn't give it a second thought.

He opened the wallet and pulled out a few 20 ryo bills and gave it to the man. "Here this should cover it." The man counted the bills and was satisfied. The man apologized and walked away.

Naruto turned and reached his hand out to Emiko, "Come Emiko, let's get you home." Emiko grabbed his hand to stay with him.
1113322222221112.title: Main Street (Gradual changes)

11133222222211121.content:
Naruto realized he didn't know where Emiko's home was. "Hey Emiko, where is your house?" Emiko let go of his hand and ran ahead, "It's this way." A concerned Naruto shouted, "Emiko wait!" He tried to catch up but lost his balance and tripped as he gained several inches growing to from 4" 9' to 5" 5'. His sandals also changed, they opened up and an ankle strap wrapped around his heel and a loop over his toes. The material hardened into dark leather. When he stood back up the world seemed a little smaller, but he was too worried to notice.

Emiko noticed him fall and ran back to him. He could see the concern in her face. Naruto gently scolded her, "Emiko this is why it's important for you to listen. I know you're eager, but if your not careful someone could get hurt." Emiko pouted, "You sound like mommy." Naruto knelt down to look her in the eyes and told her, "Your mother sounds like a smart woman, and it's because she loves you." Naruto experienced a pang of sorrow and choked up, "If someone happened to you..." Naruto teared up and wiped his eyes. When he opened them they were a dark brown instead of blue.

Emiko noticed the tears and asked, "Are you okay?" Naruto reassured her, "Yes, I'm alright. Now, let's go home, slowly this time, okay." Emiko said with a guilty look, "Okay!"
11133222222211121.title: Naruto takes Emiko home.

111332222222111211.content:
They arrived at a small two story house with a roof deck. Naruto couldn't shake the feeling of familiarity while looking at it. His thoughts were interrupted when Emiko tugged at him. "What you waiting for? We're here." Naruto opened the door and they stepped into the genkan and took off their shoes. Naruto felt compelled to wear a pair of slippers. Naruto felt like he was at home. He had a feeling he knew where everything was, but the reason eluded him.

He walked further into the house and saw the living area, the staircase, the dining table and the kitchen in the places he expected. His exploration was interrupted by a growl. He turned to Emiko who was looking at him with pleading eyes. "I'm hungry," she whined. Naruto asked, "What would you like, sweetie?" "Can we have ramen?", pleaded Emiko. Naruto laughed because it was also his favorite, "Of course, anything for you."

Naruto intended to get cup Ramen, but as soon as he stepped into the kitchen he walked to the refrigerator instead. When he saw all the ingredients for Ramen he felt a sudden headache. When it faded he knew how to prepare it. As if possessed he started taking out two pots and cutting boards. Next he washed his hands to prepare the meal, as he scrubbed, his hands became smooth and hairless, his chipped nails repaired themselves, and the calluses disappeared.

Naruto was glad that some ingredients were already prepared. It would make the process faster so his little girl didn't have to wait too long. "Wait, his little girl?", thought Naruto. He wasn't sure where the thought came from. Wasn't he supposed to find the child's mother? What was he doing? He felt Emiko tug on him, again causing him to look at her.

Emiko looked at him curiously, before asking, "Can I help?" Her cute expression made Naruto's heart melt. "Of course, dear." Naruto filled the large pot with water, and turned on the stove. While it was heating the large pot he placed another pot on the stove for the broth. While it was heating Naruto working the noodles. He instructed Emiko to put flour on the counter after giving her the scoop. When Emiko was about to spread the flour she slipped creating a cloud of flour that covered their faces. The flour caused them to cough. With each cough Naruto's voice became higher as his Adam's apple disappeared and his larynx changed. When he stopped coughing Naruto saw Emiko's face and he started giggling. His voice was high and soft. Emiko also started to giggle realizing she wasn't being punished.

Naruto washed his face to remove the flour. As the flour came off, his face lost its whisker marks, and it became softer and more feminine. His ey Naruto helped Emiko clean her face. He returned his focus on the dough. He worked it into noodles much to Emiko's delight. Naruto checked the water in the pots. He called Emiko to help with the toppings, "Come Emiko, I'll let you prepare the toppings." Naruto guided Emiko to cut various toppings. He felt immense pride in her. a feeling that was becoming normal and comfortable. Naruto, while keeping an eye on Emiko, took the pots off heat, and finished the meal. He helped Emiko place the toppings on. Emiko rushed to the table and shouted, "Yay, Ramen."

They took their places in the dining room and prepared to eat. They put their hands together and exclaimed Itadakimasu!, and began eating.
111332222222111211.title: At Emiko's House

111332222222221.content:
‘A drunk Orochimaru is a scary Orochimaru,’ thought Kabuto as his master worked feverishly on .... something.

“Kukukuku... with this, Jiraiya will finally fail. And I’ll *hic* be free to eat all the buttered toast I please!” Orochimaru laughed as he nearly knocked over his equipment as he took another swig from an unmarked bottle.

“Lord Orochimaru... don’t you think this is a little... much?” asked Kabuto nervously.

Orochimaru froze up briefly, before turning around and giving Kabuto an insane smile. “Trying to keep allllll the toast for yerself eh Ka-bu-to?” he hissed as his eyes narrowed. Walking towards his increasingly scared assistant, he continued to predate. “You truly believe you can stop me boy?”

Kabuto was sweating as fear blanked his mind. “N-no, Lord O-orchimaru! Just c-curious about the c-current plan, my liege?”

Orochimaru looked at his assistant with poorly concealed menace, before laughing and taking another sip. “Relax, my boy! I was simply kidding about the toast!” He then gave him a serious look. “But I wasn’t joking about defeating Jiraiya. T-the fool keeps interfering with my plans, and I’m done with it! So... I’m taking him and Konoha down by using his kryptonite!” he declared as he cackled once more.

“And his weakness is...” lead on a skittish Kabuto.

“Women! More specifically cougars! I will turn the entirety of Konoha’s current generation of ninja into powerless civilian women to cripple him!” he declared.

Kabuto looked... disturbed to say the least. “But, my lord... how would that even work? And what do you mean his weakness! Anyone with large breasts and an ass is a weakness to him!” he nearly screamed as the ridiculousness of the situation finally broke his silence.

“But that’s where you’re wrong, dear Kabuto! While what you say is true to a degree, I know his preference is for, in his words, ‘mature vixens who still got a rockin bod. Yeah!‘ It was always that way, first with Sarutobi’s wife, then the Damiyo’s wife before she let herself go, and finally Tsunade. Why do you think he never got married, despite the fact he’s rich of his smut?” asked a now bored Snake Sannin.

“B-but... that still doesn’t explain how!” Kabuto stammered out as shock overrode his better judgement.

“Simple. Quite simple. The virus I have developed is a simple one. It utilizes chakra to shift the cell and bone structure of the body into a malleable shape, based off Akamichi and Kaguya dna strands of course. The chromosomes of males will shift from XY to XX, while the rest of the virus rapidly ages and molds the victim into that of a slightly older woman, ranging from late 20’s to her 40’s. The virus then causes such stress on the chakra network, that becomes akin to that of, ironically kind you, a civilian woman who has no shinobi background whatsoever,” he finished.

“B-but how will you do it!? From what you described, it sounds like a monstrous amount of chakra! Not to mention how the older, more powerful shinobi will react!” he said as he tried to reason with mad, if slightly impressive, plan.

“With the help of the Kyuubi of course. The slightly more insane portion of the village always like to blame the fox for everything! So, using that train of thought, the massive reserves of energy will react with minuscule amounts leftover from the attack! It will spread rapidly, consuming the village within an hour while affecting the young and those born after the Kyuubi’s rampage. And as for how, well, the virus will also result in various pheromones being released. The build up and exposure will leave everyone present in the village very... hormonal, before submitting to base instinct-“

“-and having a village-wide orgy,” finished a shocked Kabuto.

“Exactly. The best part is the Kyuubi will have all its power drained, thus depriving them of a way to attempt to reverse it,” added a now bored Orochimaru. “Now, take this vial and go ‘visit’ our unwitting accomplices so I may plan our next move.”

Taking the vial with reverence, Kabuto bowed deeply.. “Yes my liege. I will not let you done.” He then vanished in a puff of smoke.

Waiting a minute, Orochimaru looked around for anyone left. Sensing nothing, he cackled as he brought out a loaf of bread, a stick of butter, and a large toaster. “That’ll keep that little brown nosed and idiot pervert distracted! No one’s gonna steal my buttered toast!”

Orochimaru then took another swig from the unlabeled bottle, unaware of the chaos he’d unleashed in Konoha for the foreseeable future.
111332222222221.title: Virus from Orochimaru

1113322222222211.content:
Coming upon a field of unconscious ninja, Kabuto casually walked across the field to find Naruto’s body unattended. “Well, this is convenient. A field full of test cases, and the subject is knocked out.” Seeing a faint red aura intermingled with... pink!? “You know what? This day is already weird enough as is. Just gonna use the vial and get the hell out.”

Popping a syringe full of the contents, Kabuto pushed the needle into Naruto’s vein. Injecting the contents into Naruto, he immediately took to the trees as a familiar chakra began to surge outward.

With Naruto

“Back in the sewer again. I’m getting REAL sick of this,” muttered the oblivious nin as he walked towards the seal. “All right, fox! What do you want now?”

An angry rumbled met the boy as a red blur escaped the cage. Grabbing him by the front of his shirt, an angry redhead girl with fox ears pinned him against the wall. “YOU’VE DONE IT NOW YOU STUPID LITTLE SHIT! THE WHOLE IMPRISONMENT STHICK AND DEMANDING CHAKRA WAS SOMETHING I’M USED TO. BUT BECAUSE OF YOUR RECKLESS STUPIDITY, I’VE BEEN TURNED INTO ONE OF YOU HAIRLESS APES!” raged the girl.

“K-kyuubi?!” stuttered our a scared Naruto. “What happened to you? You were a giant fox the other day, but now you’re a girl! What the-“

He was stopped as a fist slammed into his gut, causing him to cry out in agony. “YOU DO NOT GET TO SPEAK! THAT DAMN JUTSU WOULD HAVE TURNED YOU INTO THE OPPOSITE SEX, SO I TRIED TO COUNTERACT THE EFFECT. INSTEAD, I’M NOW STUCK IN THIS USELESS FORM, AND MORE IMPORTANTLY, ONLY ABLE TO USE A QUARTER OF MY POWER IN THIS FORM!”

Dropping him, Naruto tried to scramble away from the enraged fox turned girl. Taking a longer look, she did look to be around his age. Red hair reaching her back with developing figure, the only thing out of place was the fox ears. “Wait... where’s your tails?”

Stopping her internal ramble, the foxgirl instantly set her eyes on the boy. A set of predatory eyes caught the prey in its gaze. “Were you checking me out, boy?” she growled out. Taking his silence as a yes, an evil smile graced her face. “YOU. ARE. DEAD. PERVERT.”

Naruto tried to crawl away further, but a red chakra tail wrapped around his waist. Pulling him in front of her, the Kyuubi prepared her claws as she mentally planned a slow death for her dumb container.

But then the pipes representing the chakra system began to glow pink again.

“REALLY!? AGAIN WITH THIS SHIT?” roared the fox.

But then Naruto fell to the floor as the chakra disbursed.

Ka-clink.

Both Kyuubi and Naruto’s eyes widened as a huge wave of red chakra escaped the open seal. Before it swept them up, twin cries of “OH SHIT!” echoed throughout the mental sewer scape as the virus began to do its work.

11133222222222113.title: Other options

111332222222311.content:
Naruto woke up in the hospital feeling sore all over. Looking around, he saw a nurse who realized he had awoken.
He heard the nurse say, "Inform Tsunade that she's awake"

"Wait, she?" Naruto wondered

When Naruto spoke he could have sworn he'd heard a different voice. He also felt hair tickle his neck. Naruto tried to brush it away it, but it was longer than expected and when he grabbed it he noticed it was long vibrant red hair that reached his chest. This lead to a new discovery, the swell of sizeable breasts. In disbelief he moved his hands to confirm their existence. He removed the hospital gown and rushed to the mirror to examine the rest of his new body. Naruto stumbled off-balance when he stood up. He felt the way his hips swayed, and the weight of his breasts.

The mirror revealed a well-toned, but distinctly female body. Her face had familiar blue eyes and smooth whisker-less cheeks. She had long waist-length hair with a striking red color. Her arms with narrow shoulders were slim and well-muscled. Strong legs that were long and slender. Large breasts, full and round. Below it a lean abdomen. The hips flaring outward making room for her uterus. Her pubic hair forming a triangle emphasizing her vagina. She was well on her way to being strong, stunning woman.

"KYA!" Naruto screamed as reality came crashing down. Hearing the scream the attending nurse returned with Tsunade in tow. "Brat, I see you discovered your new self. I already chewed out Sakura for goading you into using the scroll. Before you ask this is permanent." Naruto sat back down on the bed. “Baa-chan, why did this happen?" a conflicted Naruto asked. "Brat, you're always attracting trouble." Naruto glared at her halfheartedly. He then confessed to Tsunade, "As strange as it sounds this doesn't bother me like it should. I feel conflicted because I feel like I should be fighting for my manhood, but I no longer feel like a man. In fact it feels weird when I call myself male." "It sounds like the transformation also affected your brain. Not only do you not feel like a man, you seem to have gained some intelligence, and maybe we'll also see some personality changes", the Hokage hypothesized.

Naruto, I need to change your records, please wait here.

“Baa-chan, call me ________.”
111332222222311.title: Yes

1113322222223111.title: Kasumi?

11133222222231111.content:
"That's a fitting name considering your heritage." said Tsunade. "What Heritage?", asked Kasumi. "We'll talk about that later in my office."

I'll be back with documents to update your status, as well as some clothes.

Kasumi pondered her situation and how she had changed from a teenage boy to teenage girl. Her Chakra felt no less powerful than before. Physically she felt strong but more flexible, compared to her previous body she felt more fit overall, all that Ramen didn't do her any favors. She would have to adapt her taijutsu to her new body to fight potentially more muscular men, like Tsunade. Shikamaru was not among them, she laughed at that thought. Mentally, her thoughts and self-doubt had disappeared and her emotions were calm. Her thoughts were interrupted when Tsunade returned.

"Here's a set of clothes. This is the best I can do on short notice. A short-sleeve shirt, standard shinobi pants, and sandals. I also brought a sports bra and matching panties. If sorry if it's a little small." explained Tsunade. Kasumi put the clothes on, but noticed the pants were a little short and the bra a little too small.

Tsunade showed Kasumi her updated documents. Name: Kasumi Sex: Female Height: 167.11 cm Weight: 54 kg

Tsunade notified Kasumi, "I expect Sakura to arrive any moment. I thought since she was there that you'd to see her."
11133222222231111.title: Yes

111332222222311111.content:
Naruto? Tsunade, told me what happened, but wow I didn't expect this. "Sakura-chan my name is Kasumi now." Na...I'm mean Kasumi, I'm sorry about tricking you into using the scroll. "It's alright It was foolish to be goaded so easily," Kasumi admitted. A concerning Sakura asked, "Are, you okay? You're not behaving how you used to."

"Sakura, I don't feel like the person I used to be, and my mind feels more clear than before" Kasumi confessed. Sakura was relieved when Kasumi's eyes gained a familiar intensity and she said with conviction, You can be damn sure I haven't lost my drive or my determination. If I'm qualified to be Hokage. Then I will take it!"

Kasumi requested "Sakura, there are things I still need to know about being a girl and you're going to teach me." Sakura smiled and said, "Gladly, but first let's tie up your hair."
111332222222311111.title: Sakura

1113322222223111111.content:
As they were walking down the street Sakura noted Kasumi was squirming in discomfort and attempting to dispel her irritation. Sakura had to ask what the problem was. Kasumi replied, "Baa-sama couldn't find appropriately sized clothing, unfortunately that included the bra." Sakura responded, "Yeah I know how that feels. Wait Baa-sama?" "Yes, I used to call her baa-chan before but I'm Kasumi now, I'm more mindful of what I call her, so I'm compromising." Sakura noted, "You're still calling her old." "Like I said more mindful, both girls giggled at that." No offense but your more tolerable as a girl.

"This is where I get my shinobi clothes. I'll get you set up." Sakura called for help, "Nuno-san, Kasumi here would like to be fitted for new clothing." "Kasumi-san this way please. So what are you looking for?, Nuno asked. Kasumi told her. "I'm looking for new clothes and a properly fitting bra." Certainly, We'll take of it." Nuno answered cheerfully. Follow me please. Nuno took Kasumi into a back room filled with cloth, pins, and thread all neatly organized. Nuno warned her, "Nui-sama is our best tailor, but be warned she has high standards and she's a bit prickly."

"Nuno-san, what do have for me this time?" "A new customer, she needs a complete makeover." Kasumi feeling she'd regret any disrespect, introduced herself, "Nui-sama, I am Kasumi, pleased to meet you." "Mm, at least you show respect, now strip." What? Kasumi was unprepared for the older woman's overbearing personality. "Are you deaf girl. I need to get a look at you." Kasumi stripped and stood naked under the scrutiny of Nui's eyes. "Not bad, I guess you do have something going for you."

Nui took out a tape measure. "I see, good proportions. Hm, breasts on the larger size, but not unreasonable and nice hips for bearing children if she retires. Good muscle too." Kasumi was blushing in embarrassment at the scrutiny. Nui's next comment snapped Kasumi back to reality, "By the time you leave you will expect you to express yourself as an elegant and capable Kunoichi. Your lucky girl I don't see just anyone. You know, there's something about that red hair of yours that reminds of someone. Kushina Uzumaki, that hellion that wouldn't respect anyone."

Kasumi made a note to see Tsunade afterward to find out who this Kushina was.


[Note: Nuno means cloth. Nui means thread. A reference to their profession]
1113322222223111111.title: Shinobi Outfitters

11133222222231111111.content:
After an hour being tortured by pins and needles Nui finished her work. Kasumi was relieved her patience had run out. Nui had her wear both shinobi wear and formal clothes including an expensive looking Kimono, that had looked stunning on her. Kasumi doubted she could afford it.

Her new outfit consisted of a short sleeve mesh shirt underneath a sleeveless Kimono that ended just below her hips. The Kimono was almost black and embroidered with a tree with falling leaves that represented Konoha in the front, and with an Uzumaki symbol in the back, the obi incorporated her forehead protector. She also wore black shorts, low-heel, knee-high boots, and plated finger-less gloves.

Kasumi admired her appearance she looked like a serious Kunoichi.
11133222222231111111.title: New Outfit

111332222222311111111.content:
When Kasumi walked out she held herself with confidence and her eyes gleamed with a familiar intensity. Sakura was blown away by the transformation a change of clothes made. If she wasn't interested in boys she'd be weak in the knees. Nuno beamed with pride, pleased with another satisfied customer.

When she saw Nuno, Kasumi's confidence dimmed when she realized she'd have to pay. Nuno assured her, "don't worry the Hokage already payed in advance." Kasumi decided to see Tsunade next. "Sakura, I need to see the Hokage." "I'm coming with you", said Sakura. "Thanks Sakura, I have a feeling I'll need someone," Kasumi said ominously.


Minutes later they arrived at Tsunade's office. Kasumi entered the room by herself with an angry look on her face. Tsunade-sama, we need to talk. Tsunade was confused "What's with the face?" Kasumi said controlling herself, "Tell me who was Kushina Uzumaki." Tsunade pinched her nose and asked quietly how did you find out. "The tailor mentioned her.". Tsunade sighed deeply. "That woman always was a pain in the ass. You should sit down for this. It's time you know everything. She paused and then shouted "ANBU clear the area and activate the seals." Tsunade took a deep breath and said, "Kushina was your mother."
111332222222311111111.title: Tsunade's Office

1113322222223111111111.content:
Kasumi's eyes turned icy her voice chilling, you knew. Sarutobi knew. All this time I've been lied too. She sIarted yelling, "I was a lonely child desperate to know who my parents were and where I came from. I would have had a reason to more serious in the academy, so I could live up to something.

Her anger turned to sadness, her eyes glistening with unshed tears, and her tone pleading, "tell me about her." "Kushina wasn't born in Konoha she was born in Uzushiogakure. They were our strongest allies before war destroyed them. They were known for their sealing prowess, longevity and red hair a trait your mother shared. Your mother was sent to Konoha because she was the best person to contain the Kyuubi." Kasumi gasped as Tsunade continued, "I didn't know her personally because I was bitter at what I lost, but she had a reputation for her temper. Your mother wasn't the first to hold the fox, the first Hokage's wife Mito Uzumaki was the first. She sealed the Fox into herself when it broke free from Madara's control."

Kasumi was struggling with several emotions. She went from feelings of Betrayal and anger to sorrow to happiness and even confusion . Anger from being lied to about her lineage. Sorrow from never having known her mother. Happy knowing about her and that her transformation and the fox gave her a greater connection to her mother. Confusion about the fox.

What happened? How did she die? asked Kasumi apprehensively. "Kasumi, what I going to say is classified, you are forbidden from sharing it with anyone. If you do I won't protect you. Now, Kushina died on the day of your birth. She was taken to a secret place to give birth. Somehow someone found out. The med-nin assisting in your birth had their throats slit. Your mother had the fox extracted. The perpetrator was an unknown Uchiha who his Sharingan to control the fox. We assume he's still out there. As for your father I'll let Jiraiya tell you. They gave their lives for you."

Kasumi chuckled darkly, her hair came out of it's tie resembling nine tails, and her eyes glowed red, "I guess I understand Sasuke's desire for revenge a little better, but I won't let it consume me. Tsunade-sama it will take time to forgive you and address you with familiarity. By the way, you can tell my friends what happened to me"

Kasumi left and Tsunade was thankful that it didn't go worse than it did.
1113322222223111111111.title: Lineage

11133222222231111111111.content:
Sakura was waiting for Kasumi and saw tears in her friends eyes. Sakura reached out and pulled Kasumi into a hug. She told Sakura what she could, "Tsunade told me about my heritage and it's a lot to take in. Sorry, but I'm not allowed to say more." Well us girls need to stick together. Kasumi managed a smile and said, "Thanks Sakura, You know, as Naruto I would've loved a girl hugging me like that, but it didn't feel like anything special." Sakura filed the information away.

They arrived at Ichiraku not long after. They heard Teuchi ask, Kushina? No, my name is Kasumi. Teuchi apologized, "Sorry, you look like someone I knew." Kasumi asked for her usual. Unlike her previous visits to Ichiraku, she ate at a civilized pace and finished earlier than before. Sakura decided it was a good time to test Kasumi's sexual orientation. Kasumi saw Sakura's expression and grew nervous. "You haven't had time to consider who you like. As a boy you liked girls, so let's find out who you like now, Kasumi groaned.

"Let's start will the girls. How about me?" Knowing she wouldn't get out of this Kasumi decided to answer. "You're good looking, but I don't feel that strongly about you anymore." Sakura continued her questions "What about the other girls?" "What about them?" Sakura smiled impishly at Kasumi's response, "Now we'll go to the boys. If my hunch is right you'll find boys much more interesting than you used to." Kasumi was unnerved by Sakura's giggling.

Sakura was about to ask Kasumi about their male friends. When she saw Team Guy. Sakura saw her chance, "look there's Team Guy," she whispered to Kasumi. Lee spotted them and shouted, Sakura-chan, how are you and whose your youthful friend? "Her name is Kasumi." "Kasumi-san, if not for my interest in the beautiful Sakura-chan I would ask for your company." Kasumi was embarrassed by his enthusiastic greeting and the indirect flattery, but thought he was too much. Lee was interrupted by Neji. "Lee you're making her uncomfortable." Neji turned toward her with a gentle smile, "I am Hyuuga Neji, I apologize for my friend's enthusiasm." Kasumi was no longer focused on Lee. Her gaze was fixed on Neji, her face a deep red. "It's...um...fine, I accept your apology." Kasumi cursed losing her composure, and she could swear Sakura was laughing at her.



[Note: Neji's name was in the Japanese order to indicate formality and his upbringing in a Noble clan]
11133222222231111111111.title: Ichiraku with Sakura

111332222222311111111111.content:
Kasumi needed to work off her frustration from earlier, and maybe get Sakura back for her embarrassment. She waited until Team Guy were out of Earshot to request a sparring match. Hey, Sakura why don't we train. I need to see what I can do now. I was thinking the same thing.

They arrived at their Training field where they became genin. She remembered letting her anger get the best of her and the humiliation from being tied on the point, but the memory was strange because her transformation made her female in mind, body and soul. She noted that she was disturbed at the thought of going back to being a boy. Sakura broke her out of her thoughts, "Hey didn't you want to spar." Kasumi apologized, "Sorry Sakura, I was just saying goodbye." Sakura was confused, "Goodbye?" "To Naruto." Oh.

Let's go Sakura. Kasumi did a few stretches, and was surprised by her body's flexibility. She was excited to get back into action. Kasumi and Sakura stared intensely into each others eyes and sprang into motion.

Sakura made the first move and slammed her fist into the earth sending chunks of rock toward Kasumi. Kasumi dodged the first rock, she decided to attempt a Rasengan one-handed and was pleased to find it forming in her hand. Her jutsu made short work of the second chunk of stone, and closed the distance. Sakura abandoned her long distance attacks and engaged Kasumi directly. Sakura threw a punch and Kasumi found herself off balance, she forget her only reference for her movement was when she was Naruto. She took a hit in the midsection. Kasumi disengaged and adjusted her attacks considering her center of gravity. She easily blocked the next strike. Sakura's strike's had substantial force. Knowing she couldn't sustain too many hits Kasumi changed her strategy, she threw some shuriken to force her opponent to back off. She decided to use a favorite of hers, the shadow clone jutsu. Several clones popped into existence. Sakura held off the first two clones, but the third broke through landing a hit. Kasumi was enjoying the rush of adrenaline. However, In the middle of the spar another presence arrived.

Kasumi and Sakura broke off their engagement ready to defend each other. "Yo, how are my cute genin doing." They relaxed having recognized their Sensei.
111332222222311111111111.title: Training Field

1113322222223111111111111.content:
Kasumi spoke first, "so you know." Kakashi told her, "Yes, Hokage-sama informed me, she also informed me about, you know what. By the way you look just like her" Thanks, Sensei. Sakura felt like she was intruding on a personal moment. They apologized for making Sakura uncomfortable. Kasumi wondered out loud, "what would Sasuke think if he found about my change." Kakashi said, "that's going to be an interesting meeting."

Sakura noting Kasumi's disconnect from her previous self had to know what she would do if they had to fight Sasuke, "Kasumi what are you going to do if we fight Sasuke?" "Sakura, I'm conflicted, I made a reckless promise as Naruto, but I still value staying true to my word, but if Sasuke threatens my friends or my home I'll do what I need to do. In any case I'll be much more careful with my promises." Sakura looked pained but she spoke, "I understand." Kakashi felt they needed to hear the reality, "if Hokage-sama ordered you to kill Sasuke and you refused you would be disobeying a direct order. I don't want you to become missing ninja." Kasumi and Sakura had grim expressions but they understood the situation.

Kakashi turned to leave but not before informing them that they should expect a mission soon.
1113322222223111111111111.title: Kakashi Arrives

111332222222321.content: As Naruto's body transformed he felt a darkness growing inside. Naruto tried to fight but he was overwhelmed. As his consciousness left him. Why, fight it? Everyone always tried to hurt him, it's only fair that he bite back.
111332222222321.title: Evil Naruko?

choices: Looking for one of Orochimaru's Secret Labs
1113322222223211.content:
Naruto's dream was filled with blood and death. He dreamed of a Queen of Darkness sitting on her throne. He awoke with a malicious smile. He heard the Hokage's voice, "I'm concerned about the foxes influence." The doctor responded, "I'm sorry I couldn't find a trace of the foxes Chakra or the seal." Tsunade told him she would have people watch Naruto.

Naruto was curious so he went to examine himself in the mirror, but felt sensations he wasn't used to. He saw a girl in the mirror. She was beautiful. She appeared strong, her limbs toned and muscular. Her face had feral red eyes and pronounced whiskered cheeks. She had red, long waist-length hair. She had large breasts, narrow shoulders and wide hips. This was his reflection now. He was a woman. She admired herself. What a strong, sexy body. Her hands roamed across her skin evoking very pleasurable sensations. Naruto began laughing maniacally. She was the queen in her vision. She vowed to show the village what a true demon was. They would have a Beautiful Demonic Queen of terrible power. Her enemies would have no mercy. All would love her and despair!”

The Hokage returned catching Naruto toward the end of her laughter. Tsunade assumed Naruto was laughing from hysteria at the transformation. Naruto told her that it's a shock to be a girl, but she'll adapt as usual. Tsunade was assured Naruto was fine and that the foxes influence only affected her appearance. When Tsunade left Naruto grinned darkly and thought, "what a fool, she's way to trusting."




[Note: some of the chapter was inspired by Galadriel's words influenced by The Ring]
1113322222223211.title: Waking Up

111332222222322211.content:
Naruto didn't appear to change, but he felt unusually irritable. Sakura tried to speak to Naruto. She asked, "Naruto are you okay?
He responded harshly, "Yeah no thanks to you." Sakura and Naruto were both surprised at his outfit. He ran home not wanting to deal with anyone. Naruto wondered why he snapped at Sakura, but he felt uncharacteristically bitter. A dark thought entered his mind, "Why shouldn't I be, she's constantly abused me." Startled Naruto sped up toward his apartment. His mood got worse when his skin started to itch, and the sun seemed to get brighter. He hissed in pain, and his eyes flashed red.
111332222222322211.title: Yes

1113322222223222111.content:
When Naruto entered his apartment he felt relief because he was no longer in sunlight. His body ached and he felt exhausted. Naruto saw his reflection and he looked terrible, his skin was much paler, and his eyes were sunken. He also noticed that his canine teeth also became fangs. Naruto panicked because he still had villagers that hated him for the fox.

His fear was realized when a Shinobi knocked down his door. In his weakened state he wasn't able to dodge the punch. The man taunted him, "Aren't you going to fight me fox? You've become weak haven't you" He struck Naruto in the gut and he collapsed. The man grabbed a kunai, and stabbed Naruto's shoulder. Naruto's gaze was fixed on the blood. His eyes dilated and turned red. His nose detected the metallic scent. It was intoxicating. His fangs ached for blood. Naruto latched onto his attackers throat ignoring the shinobi's shouts.

Naruto felt his strength return after each gulp. He couldn't get enough of the rich, tasty blood. His enemies screams became muted, and his life drained away. Naruto was satisfied by his meal, and he didn't think much about his victim. He suddenly became tired, so he locked himself in his room, and boarded up his window.
1113322222223222111.title: Apartment

11133222222232221111.content:
Naruto laid down in the darkness, and drifted off to sleep. His body began to change, the blood he consumed was the catalyst. His body was obscured by shadow. When he awoke he would be creature of the night.

Naruto opened glowing, red eyes. His body felt very different than before. He moved toward the mirror to look, but he was almost invisible. What he could see was a faint shimmer like he was using a jutsu to create visual camouflage. He inspected his body physically and realized he was now female. He noticed long dark red hair that reached his chest. His chest was filled out with sizeable breasts. His shoulders were narrow. He followed the curves to wide hips. He was pleased with his look and the strength he felt. Mentally he changed to accept the transformation.

She was a vampire and she accepted that she would need to feed on humans to survive, she couldn't afford to to be squeamish. She would feed when necessary. Those that she deemed worthy would become like her. She would be the progenitor of a new race. Naruto decided to take the name Benihime.
11133222222232221111.title: Metamorphosis

111332222222322211111.content:
Benihime wandered down the street appraising each human. She thought the majority were beneath her, and few genuinely interested her but she knew Shinobi could be a threat to her. Tonight she would test her powers. Benihime decided she needed new clothes first, not only were they boys clothes, but they were orange. Since her transformation she hated bright colors, they reminded her of the sun.

She entered a clothing store with gothic imagery. Benihime found something she liked. It was a dress with a leather corset. It was short enough not to impede her movement. She also chose stockings underneath knee-high leather boots with heels instead of Shinobi sandals. Lastly, she chose elbow length fingerless gloves with black lace. She changed outfits and discarded her previous clothes. Benihime walked toward the exit, but was stopped by the clerk, "hey, you have to pay for that." Benihime's eyes glowed as he gazed into his eyes and they glossed over. She said, "You will let this go and you will forget our encounter." She smirked revealing a fang, she would enjoy testing her powers.

111332222222322211111.title: Night Time in Konoha

1113322222223222111111.content:
Benihime sauntered down the street catching some attention, but she saw the attention didn't linger long. She assumed that this was one of her abilities because she was a vampire. It wouldn't be beneficial if she was noticed while out hunting.

Unfortunately, this didn't affect the Shinobi. She sensed their wariness, and even some lust. She cursed when one of them approached her, "I don't think I've seen you before, especially someone with such a unique appearance." She tried to play cool. "No, I don't think you have. Is there a problem with that?" He answered, "No, but I'm a Shinobi and unknown individuals make me suspicious." She approached him and trailed her hand down his cheek and said, "I'm a bit too conspicuous, don't you think?" Her actions caught him off guard and he struggled to find words, "Um...Yes...I..." Sensing his moment of weakness Benihime used her ocular ability and told him, "I'll see the Hokage to ease your concerns." He responded in dazed state, "Yeah, you do that."

Before the other Shinobi discovered her manipulation she faded into the shadows.
1113322222223222111111.title: Continue

111332222222322212.content: Will it be a Fox?
111332222222322212.title: Vixen

11133222222232221221.content:
The flash of energy was strong enough to knock out all the kunoichi present. Naruto was barely conscious as he heard a hiss as a large white snake stared at the downed nin.

“Poor Naruto-kun. I expected some poor little girl to come across my little experiment, but certainly not you,” hissed Orochimaru through his snake medium.

Not noticing his eyes turn yellow, Naruto hissed back. “What are you talking about?” Before covering his mouth as the changes began to affect his mouth.

“A simple, if not fascinating look into my own immortality jutsu, The Power of the White Snake. It uses my human base to convert the subject into a human-snake hybrid. The only problem is that only female DNA is compatible with the process. Not a problem for me, since I can easily swap bodies. But for you, well, there’s a bit of waiting process,” he hissed in thought.

Naruto could barely follow the snake’s musings as his body began to convulse as organs began to shift to something more serpentine.

“Good luck, young Naruto. I look forward to seeing how you develop and grow,” hissed the snake as it vanished in a poor of smoke.

Struggling to move as his body convulsed and shift, he finally felt his perspective shift as he finally began to move.

And wriggle free of the now empty skin as a golden snake slithered out of the mouth of his former body. Slightly larger than a an average anaconda, instinct briefly took over as Naruto analyzed the surrounding area. But his eyes widened as the weight of what Orochimaru said cake crashing down on him. ‘Wha-what’s happening to me? I-I’m a snake? But how?’

Panic overtook as he struggled to adapt to his new body. Seeing his former vessel, Naruto attempted to slither over when a piercing scream echoed throughout the training ground.

“NARUTO-KUN!!!!”

Sakura was staring at the snake in horror, then looked back to the downed body of her teammate.

Naruto stared at his horrified teammate, and attempted to speak to her. “Sa-sakura,” he struggled to hiss. But instead of his usual voice, a seductive feminine hiss cooed the voice.

Not even hesitating, Sakura tossed a kunai she was reaching for, nearly clipping the snake as it swerved to avoid the knife. “DIE YOU DAMN SNAKE!” she screeched in rage, reaching for another kunai or shuriken to strike the snake.

Instinct once again overtook the fearful snake. Hissing, Naruto slithered into the tall grass as fast as it could. Finding it still had access to chakra, the snake moved sleekly as it bolted across the field to flee the vengeful pinkette.

“Sakura! What the hell is going on?!” asked an incredulous Tsunade. The younger kunoichi were struggling to wake up as the older ones were regaining their bearings.

“Tsunade-sama! Orochimaru was here! There was a snake near Naruto! He isn’t moving!”

Naruto was torn between wanting to escape and address Sakura, but a pulse a chakra rocked through Naruto’s serpentine body. A plume of smoke enveloped the snake’s body as a summoning transported the snake to ______.
11133222222232221221.title: Yesssss

111332222222322212212.content:
At Orochimaru’s Current Lair

“Curses!” screamed an angry snake Sannin as one of his more “interesting” plans got busted.

“Lord Orochimaru! What’s happening?” asked a concerned Kabuto.

Turning to his assistant, Orochimaru sighed as he massaged his scalp in frustration. “One of my more... progressive experiments was finally beginning to take off when the snakes of Ryuuchi cave decided to claim it. Manda was especially persistent, citing ‘payment for the foolish loss of my kin during the Konoha Crush.’ He’s still angry about the battle against Tsunade and Jiraiya,” he muttered.

Now Kabuto was curious. “What could possibly so interesting that Manda and the snake summons would claim one of the experiments for themselves? Surely we could negotiate or use one of the more loyal snakes to spy?”

“Unfortunately, not this time. It’s not only Manda who intervened, but the White Snake Sage who expressed interest. No one will go against her, so we’re out of luck unless we wish to invite the entirety of their wrath. Best to wait until later,” he said, wondering how the new female snake would survive Ryuuchi Cave.

At a dark cave (Ryuuchi Cave)

In a poor of smoke, a confused Naruto was summoned to large cavernous area. Feeling confused, but strangely at ease, the snake looked around before seeing a large mass of snakes staring back. Nearly eeping in spite of itself, the snake collected itself before calling out. “Hello?” it hissed, finding it easier to communicate in hisses.

A loud booming voice greeted her back. “‘Hello?’ She says? No even a demand for like ‘What am I doing here?’ or ‘Where am I?’! Joy, the snake picks a meek little mouse to masquerade as a snake!” A large purple snake with green eyes sneered back as he slithered down, judging the new arrival with its piercing gaze.

Before it could respond, a second voice stopped Manda in its tracks. “You seem awfully cavalier with your attitude Manda? Need I remind you who is really in charge here already?” hissed out a soft, but deadly voice.

Naruto stared up at massive snake sitting a stone plateau. The largest snake it had ever seen stared back, a purple turban with a red jewel sitting upon its massive head. Smoking from a massive cigarette holder, it breathed out smoke before continuing. “Allow me to clarify for that foolish hatchling, my dear. You are in Ryuuchi Cave, the home of all summon snakes. And you’ve been brought here as a curiosity on my whim.”

The smoke coalesced around the young snake forming into a genjutsu showing the history of the cave. “Many have come to study senjutsu, or natural energy, to augment their power and failed. They would often turn into stone or snakes themselves, depending on their constitution of course. But you, are the first to become a snake via Orochi-Chan’s little experiment. So we claimed you as our own in order to see if this new method of conversion is viable.”

Naruto was shocked as the information processed. “Then what are going to do with me?” it hissed out.

Manda, having remained silent, took over the conversation. “You’ll be used as breeder, you fool! You can barely move and communicate as is, and would be useless as combat breed! Besides,” he hissed as he shrank to Naruto’s size,” you look especially fertile. A few rounds with me, and you’ll most certainly lay a good couple of clutches of eggs,” he hissed as he wrapped around the now frightened snake.

“B-but, I-I’m a boy,” it whispered as Manda’s head came into view.

“Doesn’t matter what you were then. Whatever Orochimaru did, it converted you into a snake. A female snake. And I haven’t had a good breeder in years. You’ll do well,” he hissed, preparing to mount the now female Naruto.

And then a large white tail cuffed Manda’s head, wrapping around his shrunken frame while holding him in place. The White Snake Sage stared him down, glaring at the struggling snake. “AGAIN, MANDA? You forget your place!”

Manda was thrown into the deeper recesses of the cave, a scream echoing as he traveled down.
111332222222322212212.title: Ryuchi Cave

1113322222223222122121.content:
Huffing in annoyance, the elder snake regarded the new snake in front of her. “My apologies. Manda is one of the stronger snakes we have had in generations, and believes himself to be above rules.”

“Is what he said true? A-about me being a girl?” hissed out a fearful Naruto.

“I’m afraid it is, hatchling. Because of Orochimaru’s meddling into affairs best left alone, you are now one of us. But fret not, many come to enjoy being members of the Snakes! We’re one of the more powerful summons in the world, and boast strong summoners at our beck and call!” she hissed in pride.

“Even Orochimaru?” hissed the incredulous Naruto, getting a sweat drop from the old sage.

“A work in progress. He started out promising, but the whole immortality fiasco has caused some... concerns about his worth. Disregarding that, it’s time to discuss your fate my dear Naruto. While we intervened when Orochimaru attempted to summoned you, you must understand it is for a reason. I foresee an interesting future for you, but whether it’s reached now or later is for you to decide.”

Naruto was a bit surprised by that last bit. “You see my future? What does it mean? Do I changebackorbecomeHokageor-“

She was stopped by a light thump of the sage’s tail. “Slow down hatchling! You rush about with no patience. Like every other snake who stands before more, you’ll have six months to train and learn. Should you succeed as a fighter, you’ll be contracted and serve out the clan’s best interest as a representative. Not for Orochimaru,” she added.

“Did you not just listen, or are tormenting because you think I planned this?! Yes to both, as I just said!”

Making up her mind, Tsunade mentally smirked as a plan formed in her head. “Fine. You have a deal.”

Getting ready to let loose another tirade, Jiraiya stopped mid-thought. “... Wait ... what?”

“We have agreement. You cut your perverted acts, and will not perform one perverse act for one week,” she started.

“Go on, Hime. You have my attention,” Jiraiya led on.

“Last one week, and you win this little wager. I’ll believe you,” she then moved closer without him even seeing,” I’ll be your bride.”

Jiraiya’s eyes nearly bulged out, his mind completely on reset. “W-wha-?”

“That’s what you always wanted, isn’t it? And at this moment, you’ve been more honest then over our career as ninja. Prove your intentions are pure, and I will have no problem becoming your bride, lover, whatever floats your boat,” she finished with a smile.

“... And if I lose?” he asked in a silent tone.

“Then I’ll decide your fate, since I will have won. I refuse to have a perverted husband that wouldn’t consider my feelings,” she finished.

With that, Jiraiya hopped in the air. “Well then, that settles it Hime! No women for a week? Pffff! No problem for the gallant Jiraiya!” Bouncing off the walls like a literal toad he called back down. “Get a dress ready then, Hime! Cause I intend on marrying you the moment I win!”

Watching the sage vanish into the village, Tsunade held her stomach with a soft smile. “Let’s hope so, Jiraiya. Let’s hope so.”

Does Jiraiya succeed?

He almost made it. But the last minute, the last possible minute. A fucking band of skimpily dressed kunoichi did him in.

“Well, you almost made it.”

He didn’t even need to turn around to know who it was. “Yeah, I know l. Old habits die hard, but that’s no excuse. You win. So do what you want to me,” he said as he felt his only chance finally slip way.

Tsunade only pursed her lips at his tone. “Glad to see you agree. You almost made it one week, it failed because of one slip-up.”

Jiraiya braced himself for the verbal tone lashing.

“Guess I got my work cut out for me.”

He turned around, only for Tsunade to hold him in place with her super strength. “Pucker up hubby-!” She literally stuck her tongue down his throat, exploring her new husband’s mouth throughly. After a minute, she pulled back. “Mama likes,” she teased.

“But ... I thought...” Jiraiya was immediately treated to another oral exam by the woman.

“You thought... you were done ... with me after... this,” she said in between kisses. “Oh, no no no!
You don’t get that lucky. I won, so I decide your fate. And the sentence is to the institution of marriage to me with no hop of escape!”

“But you said that I had to prove myself!” Jiraiya was shouting at this point.

“And you did. Can’t have a husband who can’t control his libido. And in between me and some hard work, you’ll be more than kept in check.”

“So to be clear, we’re technically a couple now?” he asked. “And we’re going to be married?”

“Already are. Took care of that this morning,” she replied.

Jiraiya simply nodded, then wrapped his hand around her waist. Pulling her in, repaying her earlier favor enthusiastically. “Well, it’s look like we should consummate the marriage then. Who knows, maybe we’ll get lucky and have a kid!”

Tsunade giggled, confusing Jiraiya. “See you at the tower then. And besides, our baby is already on the way, thanks to last week.

Jiraiya wasn’t stunned by the news. Then he just shrugged his shoulders to chase that wild filly that finally became his wife.
11533222112312.title: Of course not! He’s Jiraiya!

115332221123121.content:
And so the village came to learn of Tsunade and Jiraiya’s ...eventful shotgun wedding. While it took awhile for things to calm down, the village came to accept the new status quo.

All except Kakashi, who was devastated by Jiraiya’s announcement that Icha Icha would go in hiatus pending three final releases. Many women were relieved that Jiraiya’s antics would be toned down in large part due to his marriage.

The village council themselves felt mixed by the decision. There was a happiness to be held when Tsunade announced her marriage. But were understandably trouble upon learning it was Jiraiya who she chose.

The older generation was amused, while the younger ones were split. The blow caused by the decision was lessened with announcement of Tsunade’s pregnancy. Say what you will about Danzo and his Black Ops group, but he was ecstatic about the potential return of the Senju.

Which brings us to our final part of the story.

“JIRAIYA YOU SON OF A BITCH! THE NEXT TIME YOU WANNA HAVE SEX, WEAR A RUBBER! AHHHHHH!”

The screams of Tsunade could be heard throughout Konoha. It was time for her baby to come into the world. And she’d been in labor for a good hour.

Jiraiya was by her bedside in the hospital, watching his new wife go through labor pains. He was excited for his son or daughter, but watching Tsunade suffer was horrifying.

Shizune was attending to her master, watching the head crown. “Just a little more, Tsunade-samba. Push!”

Holding Jiraiya’s hand, Tsunade nearly squeezed the life out of it as she felt him drowning. Pacing herself, she began push harder than she ever did before in her life. Until finally-

“Aaaaah!”

“Oh shoot-“

“Waaaahhhh!”

-it was finally over. Holding a small child with hazel colored eyes and blonde hair, Shizune smiled. “Congratulations, Lady Tsunade! It’s a healthy baby boy!”

Putting the baby on master’s abundant chest, she nearly swooned with joy as Tsunade cradled the newborn to her bosom.

Across the room, Jiraiya couldn’t help but smile as he nursed a broken hand. He finally got what he wanted after so long. A wife and child. Speaking up, he asked. “So what’s our kid’s name Hime?”

Looking up as she held her child as he began to nurse, she offered a tired smile. “It should be obvious considering who your last student was. Naruto. Naruto Senju.”

115332222111111122111.content:
Kushina was trying to fight her way to the Hokage's tower, when she felt a brief shiver go down her spine. Looking around, she didn't notice anything different, but then felt two pieces of metal dangle from her ears.

Looking into a window display, she was dressed the same except for a few key differences. Her bust was now a bit more on display, flashing a hint of a lacy bra. But what really stood out was two decorative uchiwa fan earrings sticking out from her lobe. Turning her back quickly, her back now displayed the same symbol on her back.

"What the hell is Sasuke-kun's symbol doing on my back? Wait?! Why am I calling Sasuke-kun by his name instead of te-"

She paused briefly as a thought passed through her head.

"-koi?"

Shaking her head Kushina, felt confused as alien thoughts filled her head.

Instead of dying to the fox, Minato died with her child. Heartbroken, she stayed with her best friend Mikoto and her clan. They took her in-

"No! This isn't right!"

-cared for her through this desperate time. She helped train Itachi, and watched over Sasuke. How she was out of town when the Uchiha Massacre happened-

"Get out of my head!"

-that she swore to help avenge her adopted clan. She would train Sasuke, but ultimately as more time passed, she felt something stirring within her. There was just something that drew her to him. Made her want more-

"STOP! THIS! NOW!" she was screaming. but it seemed like no one would help her,

-to be his loving wife. To care for him. To bear his young. To revive her clan. She is his weapon. His bride-

"NO! I DO-"

There was a white flash as everything seemed to stop.

Feeling a swelling of pride in her bosom, Kushina lost herself to her new personality. Gaining a prideful smirk, she set of towards her new, or rather old, home to plan.

Three Months Later

"Harder Sasuke-kun! HARDER!"

Kushina was being taken from behind by Sasuke once again. In the three months since the jutsu took hold, the village has noticed a drastic change in the jinchuuriki woman's behavior. She's becoming snootier, and became more condescending to civilian and ninja alike who weren't Uchiha. She relished in the jealousy, slowly embracing her place on Konoha's political system as wife of the prestigious Uchiha clan.

"I'm CUMMING!"

Unsurprisingly, the first thing Sasuke did was to claim her as soon as she walked in. He wanted to revive the clan as soon as possible, and Kushina was more than willing to help.

Panting, Kushina turned to her husband. "Oooohhh, Sasuke-kun. You know hot to make a woman work for it."

"Hn."

On the other hand, Sasuke was still the same brooding avenger of Konoha. Just with someone willing to spread her legs that he actually has a use for.

Slipping on a dark blue robe, Kushina slid out the room.

"I'll be back!" she called out teasingly.

In place of the messy pigsty that normally dominated, the living room now had a new couch that was PINK, with matching pillows. The rickety old coffee table had been replaced with a sturdy one with vine designs and a glass top that could be removed when cleaning. The rest of the room wasn't overall girly, but with touches here and there that would indicate a young woman lived here.

The bed was now a queen size with a row of new pillows with a frilly white pillow in the middle that looked like at was hand sewn. Walking over to her new wardrobe, Kushina saw it was filled with her new clothes from the store.

Walking into the bathroom, it was mainly the same with the exception of the medicine cabinet being filled with various things for her new time of the month. She then noticed a note attached to the mirror. Picking it up, it read:

Dear Kushina,
Since it was our fault that you ended up being changed against your will, the least we felt we could do is help you accommodate to your new lifestyle. So we managed to pull some strings, cleaning and redecorating the apartment. We know it can't make for what we did, but all of us are here for you if you ever need any help. We hope you like it!

Sincerely,
The 5th Hokage, Shizune, Anko, Kurenai, Temari, Hinata, Tenten, Ino, and Sakura

1153322221111112121212111221211.content:
Kushina stepped out of the carriage, her patience worn thin as the driver had yet to return. “Thrice damned baka! How hard is it to rent a room?” she angrily muttered to herself. She wandered away from the carriage, muttering angrily to herself as she walked through the woods to the town, her dress hiked up so it wouldn’t drag on the ground. She froze as she came upon a horrid sight, the driver and her samurai, all dead and strewn about in a small clearing up ahead. Her eyes narrowed as she swiveled around, searching for the culprits. The sound of metal cutting through air reached her ears, forcing her to roll to the right as a salvo of kunai and shuriken pierced the ground where she was standing. A bandit appeared on top of a tree branch, garbed in a green flak jacket, black combat pants, shinobi sandals, and a Kumogakure headband with a slash going through the symbol. He was tall, standing around 6 feet with dark skin, brown hair in a crew cut, and slate grey eyes.

You killed my protection detail, and I’m not going to let that slide.” With that said, she shot forward, chains whipping about as she tried to skewer the rogue shinobi.

He jumped away from the branch just as it was torn apart, hands flying through seals before ending on dragon. “Lightning Release: Electromagnetic Murder!” Arcs of electricity shot out of his outstretched palms, tearing apart the ground as they headed towards Kushina. She flipped backwards, just barely managing to avoid the jutsu. She peered forward, unable to see through the dust and debris that the jutsu had tossed into the air, her chains hovering in front of her as a makeshift barrier.. He grabbed the hilt and pulled on it, pulling the rest of the object out of the bushes, revealing that it was a sword in a light violet sheathe. The sword wasn't particularly long, and it was unusually wider then most swords that he had seen and its handle was silver wrapped in a purple cloth, and its guard is as wide as its blade, with three small holes on both ends.

"Wow, a sword," Naruto muttered in awe. "Did someone leave it out here?"

He grabbed the sword and pulled it out of the sheath, revealing that the sword was longer than its sheath, and has the distinction of being completely hollow in the middle, essentially consisting of nothing more than the edges of what would otherwise be a normal sword.

"Maybe I should get some sword supplies first," Naruto muttered to himself, but his stomach decided to make itself known and let out a loud growl, reminding him of how hungry he was. "Or I could get it afterwards."

Either way they were rather close to one another and he could head straight to the other one after going to another. He placed the sword back in its sheathe made his way to leave the training grounds with a smile on his face, happy with what he had found.

Unknown to him his fate was sealed the moment that he touched that sword and pulled it out of its sheath.
