115332222222222222232212112111.title: How did it happen?

1153322222222222222322121121111.content:
Jiraiya sighed once again. The brat and him got into another argument again and wanted to be trained. Right when he was talking to lovely women. He loved his godson, but times like this gave him such a headache. "What I wouldn't give for the little brat to see things my way. . ." He muttered.

"Stop that thief!" Someone called out, getting Jiraiya's attention.

To his sight, there was an elderly man on the ground as a masked man was running away from him with what looked like a scroll.

Jiraiya narrowed his eyes. He would've preered if it was a cute woman, but that doesn't mean that he wouldn't stop some idiot who thinks he could just steal from people. "Alright then, it'll get my mind off of what happened." He casually said as he rushed after the thief with barely any effort.

WHAM!

The man flew back from the blow and skid for several feet. The man groaned and Jiraiya walked forward and pinched a nerve knocking him out cold. Jiraiya grabbed the scroll and looked at the old man.

"T-Thank you sir." The elderly man got out in graditude before he then recognized him. "O-Oh my, your Jiraiya of the Sanin!" He then got out in shock.

"Ahh, I see you know me," Jiraiya commented, smirking. "I believe this is yours." He then stated as he handed him back his scroll.

The elderly man happily took the scroll back. "T-Thank you Jiraiya-sama." He thanked.

The local shinobis soon came around and after a quick explanation and several eye witness accounts, they took the man away.

Now that the thief was dealt with Jiraiaya's mind went back to Naruto and he couldn't help, but let out a sigh.

"Is there something wrong Jiraiya-sama?" The old man asked with curiosity.

"Just thinking about my god child," Jiraiya muttered.

The eldery man nodded to that. "Ah, some kind of problem?" He then asked.

Jiraiya sighed once more to that. "Yeah, he just can't see things my way." He then revealed.

"Ahh trust me I know the feeling well." The man replied with a chuckle.

Jiraiya chuckled back to that. "Sometimes I wish I could make that brat see things my way." He then admitted.

The man laughed out loud and said. "We all wish for that at times." The man put his hand into his pocket and revealed what looked like a black shiny gem. "A friend of mine gave me this and told me that if you wish on this, then you're wish will come true eventually. Though I never used it to make a wish, just as a reminder of him." He then revealed.

Jiraiya chuckled more to that. "That does seem to be far fetched." He admitted.

"I know right. He always did have a thing for his stories. Like you to have to have it for helping me out today." The man said, holding out the gem for him to take. "Here', a reward for getting my scroll back." He then offered.

Jiraiya then once more looked at the black gem. "Are you sure about this?" He then asked.

"I wouldn't have made the offer if I wasn't sure about it." the old man countered.

"True." Jiraiya admitted. He then scatched his head. "Alright then, I'll take it." He soon decided.

"Hope it brings you some comfort," the man said. He left, leaving Jiraiya alone with his thoughts.

Jiraiya held the gem in his hand and rubbed it. "Nah, there's no way. . ." He said to himself with a chuckle as he held it. "I wish that Naruto could see things more my way." He jokingly wished with a chuckle as he placed it in his pocket. "Though I wish I had a nice girl who values a women's body like I do." He then muttered.

-

As Naruto walked around he began to feel off for a moment. "Weird dattebayo. . ." He muttered.

(What changes next)
1153322222222222222322121121111.title: Bonding between Godson and Godfather

11533222222222222223221211211111.content:
"Damn it! Why doesn't that pervy old man want to train me? If he knows Granny and is a disciple of the Third, then he has his stuff to be a teacher. So why doesn't he just help me? He said he is interested in me, but all he does is look at girls!"

To say Naruto was a little angry right now is an understatement. Jiraiya was a great shinobi, but the boy couldn't understand why he was so obsessed with checking out women. It was true that the young jinchūriki wasn't exactly at the age where he would try to check out members of the fairer sex, but it was still aggravating for him that he seemed to pay more attention to random girls rather than his own pupil.

Looking around after calming a little bit, Naruto found himself in an unfamiliar neighborhood, as he was now in an area which he didn't really frequent as much. Coincidentally, it was relatively close to Ichiraku Ramen, his favorite hanging spot, but he was now a very good distance away from where he had his argument with Jiraiya.

"Great... I ran too much and I don't know where I am. Well, I guess the place does look a bit familiar, so I should be able to get back to the main road eventually.", murmured the boy to himself. As he looked around to familiarize himself with his surroundings, he noticed two older girls, probably in their early twenties talking with each other on the side of the street. What was special about them was that their outfits showed a good amount of their curves, as one of them put one arm under her bosom, emphasizing their rather large size.

"What's so special about girls that that the pervy sage likes to look at them so much?" Normally, Naruto would just walk pass them without much interest, but the more he gazed at them, the more he found himself taken by their looks. When one of them was posing for a bit, and said something about buying new clothes to draw more attention, he couldn't help but feel a little attracted. "Well... I guess she does look a little nice. Medium brown hair, pretty face, nice figure. I wonder if Sakura would look like that when she grows older.", thought Naruto before he saw the girl put a hand on her chest, showing the outline of their breasts a bit. "No, most definitely not. There's no way her chest will be that big if they didn't started growing until now. Maybe Ino or Tenten will be like that, although when it comes down to butt or hips, I don't know who will have them bigger... And the other one looks pretty nice too. Her chest is a little smaller, but the longer hair and smaller waist kind of makes up for it..."

No one seemed to try to stop, or even notice Naruto checking the two girls out. Not even the young women themselves, as despite taking a few gazes at the boy, who was quite close to them, they didn't seem at all bothered, and continuing their conversation. As for Naruto, he was finding himself drawn more and more by the pair's figure, and was about to come closer to them, before stopping himself, and shaking his head.

"That was... weird. First I felt off for a second, and now this? Whatever, I am sure it's nothing. I should just keep walking until I get to some place I know." Before leaving, he took one more glance at the two women before he left, with a small, but a little perverted smile on his face. "Although this whole thing with looking at girls might not be too bad actually. It is pretty fun... Perhaps I should apologize to the pervy sage when I meet him again..."
11533222222222222223221211211111.title: Notices Women (Mental)

115332222222222222232212112111111.content:
As he continued to walk, Naruto tried to take in his surroundings and saw that the place seemed to be a lot more packed with various stores then he thought initially. One would easily mistake it for the shopping district, but despite being quite far from the city center, the street was apparently frequented by people who had a bit more money in their pockets. In reality however, he couldn't really pay too much attention to what was going on around him, as he was a little lost in thought.

Ever since looking at the two women from before, he had a hard time not thinking about their figures. Soon, his mind wandered from the pair, to the girls he knew, and started to carefully analyze them based on appearance. There was a part of him that was genuinely confused why he was suddenly interested in the same things as Jiraiya all of a sudden, but he didn't seem to acknowledge anything alarming for the moment, and instead let his imagination free for a bit.

"Hmm, so Ino has a good shot in terms of butt, and the chest is kind of promising too, so I guess we will wait and see how it becomes. Tenten also looks like she has a good bust, but I doubt she will be bigger than Ino. Hinata is kind of a mystery, as she never takes off her jacket, but I am not going to take her out of the running just yet without taking a proper look at her first. And Sakura... yeah, not much to expect there. She isn't developed in any way anywhere, expect probably her hips, but her chest will most likely not grow too much, judging on her training. And she acts all cute and girly, but it's obvious how much of a tomboy she is underneath. It is kind of charming, but in terms of figure, she isn't really winning me over."

Talking about his crush like that was something that uncharacteristic for Naruto. Normally, he would appreciate her good features such as her determination and care for her teammates, and would most likely than not omit most of the negative thoughts he would have about her during one of his daydreams. But now, he seemed a lot more keen on focusing on her physique, which seemed quite lacking. And paired with an attitude that one would most likely describe as "tough as nails", seemed to make the boy not feel as attracted to her as before.

Also, while it was subtle, the color of his hair seemed to lighten a little bit, while the spikiness of his locks was gradually going away. His usual greasy hair seemed to disappear, as his mane was slowly starting to look glossier and softer. In addition, his forehead protector was slowly shrinking as well, with the metal plate containing the emblem of his village becoming smaller as well.

"...Okay, I know it is weird for me to think about all this stuff all of a sudden, but I can't really seem to stop. Is it really because of something the pervy sage said, or am I suddenly interested in girls look like?", asked Naruto to himself as he wondered the origin of his new thoughts, before dismissing his worry. "Nah, I am sure it's nothing really. Perhaps this might be a sign I am growing up, which is perfectly fine with me. Heck, perhaps the pervy sage can now talk more freely with me about what he likes in girls without the mood getting too awkward. And besides... I know the girls from class are all cute and all, but I think I know who that dirty old man is looking at. Granny Tsunade might need to lay off the sake more often is she wants to find a man, but in terms of body, I think she has no equal-"

"What are you doing here?" The sudden question broke his focus, just as he put on a perverted smile on his face, and turned around to see who called to him.
115332222222222222232212112111111.title: Thinking about girls

1153322222222222222322121121111112.content:
He was surprised, but also a little annoyed when he saw that the one behind him was his rival and teammate, Sasuke Uchiha, who had a bored expression on his face.

"Sasuke? Why are you here?"

"I believe I asked my question first." With how neutral the replay came, Naruto couldn't help but make a small scowl.

"Well I was just looking around this place for a bit before you came."

"Really? This isn't really a place I would imagine you spending much of your time at. Knowing you, I think you just had a fight with your mentor and decided to run away in frustration. After all, while I do like to stroll from time to time, I know for a fact you don't."

Now the blond was ready to pop a vein. There was always something that irked with you Sasuke was talking, sounding almost he was getting scolded by him. He wasn't really wrong in his assumption, but there was no way Naruto would ever give his rival the benefit of goading about something. Judging by his expression, he wanted to hear a reply, most likely to then say he is too childish once again. He was about to say something back, when suddenly some of the irritation he felt evaporated, and instead of a yell, a sigh came out instead.

"Look, I just... don't want to argue with you right now. It doesn't really matter why I am here, no? You said you came here to take a walk? Well, that's okay, I wanted to do that too. Let's just walk together until we get to the main street and not fight for five minutes?"

"...Okay." The Uchiha was left stunned a little by how his friend acted. He didn't expect Naruto to cool off so quickly or that he would propose to walk together, given their usual bickering. They weren't so bad as they were in the beginning, but Naruto seemed a lot more amicable than usual. Without much else to talk, the two slowly began to move once again. While his teammate was looking around at the shops, Sasuke kept looking at him with a little suspicion.

"What is with him all of a sudden? It's very rare for him to not complaining about anything, and would rather rant about either me or someone else that annoyed him. But he seems a little more calm than I thought. Don't tell me this guy suddenly decided to act more mature... There's no way he would be thought something like that by Jiraiya. And was he thinking before I got here? He seemed to be quite distracted and... Hmm?"

Sasuke was a little confused by the fact that Naruto's usual spiky hair was now laying flat on top of his head, and also it looked a lot more taken care of than usual. And he couldn't see it just yet, as he wasn't looking down, but both his hands and feet started to shrink and slim down, but they didn't appear to lose any of its callousness.

"What happened to his hair? Did he use the wrong shampoo or was he pranked by someone? Either way, it is a little strange that he didn't say anything about it just yet..."

While Sasuke was pondering about what was wrong, Naruto continued walking without paying much attention to him. He was for a second distracted when his sandals seemed a little big on his feet, but he quickly adjusted them without noticing the state of his feet. Once he was done, he took a small glance at his friend, as he gave another small sigh.

"Great, why did he have to pop out like that anyway? I guess just walking around and doing nothing is something he would do, but even so... why did I have to meet the most antisocial guy from class around? I don't really mind him being here, but I wish he wouldn't be so critical all the time. And his attitude needs a lot of improving too. The guy doesn't even see that Sakura and Ino have a thing for him. I mean, I don't really mind him being someone who is uptight and whatnot if he could just be nicer. I want to be better friends with me as well, and I want to help him if possible... I just wish he would be a better person, who could understand me."

As he uttered those words in his head, he accidentally bumped Sasuke's shoulder. The next second, the young Uchiha felt a small electric current coming from where he was bumped, but paid no mind to it as he continued to walk. Since Naruto was a jinchūriki, hic chakra was a lot denser and stronger than normal, which made the effects of the original wish splash onto Sasuke upon contact, due to part of the chakra being released when Naruto made his wish. While certain details about Jiraiya's desire got onto him too, he was now mostly being influenced by Naruto, as he would soon fit the profile as the Uzumaki's best friend.
1153322222222222222322121121111112.title: Sasuke

11533222222222222223221211211111122.content:
Sasuke kept looking at Naruto, feeling more confused by the minute, as he could not only swear his hair was becoming a little wavier towards the tips, but also a little longer, as it began touching the nape of his neck, with the blonde seemingly being none the wiser. "What's going on? Is this some kind of jutsu at work? That idiot either doesn't realize what's going on or-"

"Hey Sasuke." The Uchiha's thoughts were stopped as Naruto turned to him. "Mind if I ask you something?"

"...What is it?"

"What do you think of Sakura?"

While he tried to not look distracted before, and maintained a straight face, this time, Sasuke could only raise his eyebrows in wonder. "What brought this up? Did she or Kakashi-sensei told you something?"

"No, but it was on my mind for a while and I wanted to know. I just couldn't bring it up when the others were around."

"Is that so?... Well, other than thinking of her being our teammate who tries a little too much to be liked by others, who has issues keeping her calm and acting almost as childish as you at times, I am not sure what else is for me to say." It was kind of obvious where his stance on Sakura was, with the pink-haired shinobi being more of an annoyance to him than anything else. Naruto, who now was looking at him with a bit of anger in his eyes was about to say something, but Sasuke suddenly felt compelled to say something else. His voice cracked a bit at the start, and the words that came out of his mouth went an octave higher, but he didn't think much of it. "I... I think however that she works quite hard and is quite studious. And her short fuse aside, her optimism is welcome. She has what it takes to be a shinobi, it's just that she's like a diamond in the rough."

He wasn't sure where the last part came from, but Sasuke suddenly saw a lot more good points in Sakura than before. He wouldn't exactly call it a change of heart, as he still found her short temper and aggressiveness a little too overbearing, but he was now thinking of her in a much positive light than before.

On the side, Naruto grinned a bit as he was a little proud at how his friend finally said some good points about their teammate instead of the usual complaints he had about her. After chucking softly, he gave him a thumbs-up. "There you go! It's nice to see you appreciate others for a change."

"I do that after I evaluate them. Offering empty praise to someone is not something I like to do. I made those comments about Sakura after looking at her long enough to realize her better side, that's all."

"So you had your eyes on her? I take it you do have a thing for her?"

"Not at all. Just because she is a little likable doesn't translate to me liking her. But why are you asking this anyway? Do you have feelings for her and want to see if you have competition? I do recall you taking a few glance at her every now and then."

If this was the usual Naruto, he would immediately say "yes" in a heartbeat. But given his new tastes in girls, he wasn't so sure that was the case. "...Maybe? I am not sure. I guess I kind of had a thing for her at the start, but it's not much right now. And those times you saw me looking at her? It was just to study her body figure. I wanted to make sure how good she would look in the future."

"...That sounds really superficial."

"Hey, not even you would date a girl that doesn't look pretty, right? I know people say that looks aren't everything, but it doesn't mean they have no value. You have to agree with me that some of the other girls we know look more attractive than others, and I wanted to make sure who is better, that's all."

"I think you have spent a little too much time with Jiraiya."

"Heh, perhaps, but that doesn't mean I can't have his tastes, you know? I just tend to look for something other than personality.", said Naruto with a grin, while Sasuke only sighed and shook his head.

It didn't occur to the two that their usual bickering seemed to be a thing of the past right now. There was still a little bit of tension between them, but it was a far cry from their usual arguments. Sasuke also didn't seem bothered by Naruto's hair anymore, while his own mane started to grow, with his bangs straightening out completely and laying down flat on his head, while the blonde's still had a few unruly locks here and there. It also gained the same sheen as Naruto's as it now looked a lot more well-maintained than before.
11533222222222222223221211211111122.title: Talking

115332222222222222232212112111111221.content:
They continued walking, occasionally looking at the various shops that were on the street, neither expecting such variety in a district not so far from the academy. Naruto was also partially distracted by the girls that passed him, looking at their figure, and especially their breasts whenever he got the change without them noticing, while Sasuke, rather than looking confused by his friend's behaviour, he only shook his head, slightly exasperated by his antics. During this time, any strand of hair that was below their eyebrows fell off their bodies, leaving their skin smooth and peachy, with Sasuke's complexion tanned a little bit as well.

Eventually however, both heard a small growling coming from their stomachs, which made the two realize they were getting a little hungry.

"Damn... Maybe I should have eaten more before I left. Should we go to Ichiraku Ramen and eat there?"

"I am also feeling a little famished but it is a little too early for lunch. Maybe we should stop at one of the food stores and look for something there. From what I've seen so far, the prices aren't too big, so the cost shouldn't be a problem."

"Sounds good to me. Hopefully we'll find something good around here."

The two then began looking around at the various street foods the vendors offered, taking note of both the aspect of the food, as well as the price. As they did that, neither noticed how they both started to grow a little. It wasn't too noticeable at first, but they both gained a few inches in height in the span of less than five minutes. This was because their bodies were maturing at a very fast pace, as they both grew up to fourteen years old. In addition, Sasuke's hands and feet changed the same way as Naruto's as they slimmed down considerably, before both of their calves tingled a bit as their muscles became a lot more compact and leaner, without losing any strength, and in the blonde's case, actually became stronger. This had the effect of making their clothes feel a lot smaller now, both of them pulling on them a little as they tried to make them less uncomfortable.

After a few more minutes, both stopped at a vendor who was serving different types of dango at a reasonable price, with some people making a small line in front of him.

"What do you say Skaruke? Are you okay with some dango?"

"I suppose I do Karugo. I hope they have some Chadango."

"Really? Do you really like green tea?"

"Perhaps I do have a little craving for it... But I am mostly curious how it tastes, that's all."

"If that's what you want, I am not going to stop you. I'll just go for the usual Anko."

The two then went to the line and patiently waited for their turn. Neither noticed the strange way they called each other a moment ago, because they both now firmly believed those to be their names. Their minds continued changing as they waited, as Karugo's wish to be Hokage and Skaruke's desire for revenge were both slowly getting less of a priority for both of them. Also, other than the blonde's new interest in women, he also began getting a little more perverted with his thoughts, idea of groping one sounding more appealing with each passing moment. As for the brunette, his darker and gloomier thoughts were getting rewritten with more positive ones making his expression look less sour the more he waited.

When there were only a couple of people left in front of them, they heard someone calling them. "Naruto? Sasuke?" Upon noticing the familiar voice, they were a little surprised when they saw who it was.
115332222222222222232212112111111221.title: Stopping for a snack

1153322222222222222322121121111112211.content:
The pinkette stared at her friends, confused by their appearance. Seeing Naruto with wavy hair instead of his natural spiky look was indeed strange, but she would normally think it ended up that way due to one of his hijinks, but For Sasuke's locks to look as straight as they currently do was something she didn't see coming. She was about to ask if he was somehow roped in one of Naruto's plans before the blonde came up to her.

"Hey Sakura, nice moment to drop in!", said Karugo. "Say, do you want some dango? We were about to buy some for a little snack. What do you say? I'll pay for you if you want."

She was a little taken aback by how her friend acted. He didn't seem as annoying as before, and seemed to take a manner of speech similar to Ino's, which made her wonder if something happened to make him look more upbeat than usual. However, her eyes widened as she saw how his features seemed to soften a bit, with his eyes being bigger and nose becoming a little smaller. But what was more strange was that his cheek marks started to fade away, the bottom one almost completely vanishing, and yet, he did not even seem to mind or notice.

Sakura took a look at Skaruke who stood back to keep the line and saw that like Karugo, his face looked a little more feminine. What was unexpected what that instead of the normal brooding, disinterested look he usually had in his eyes, the Uchiha seemed a bit more cheerful, seeing a small smile on his lips. Despite his face looking different, the idea of seeing her crush giving her a smile made her blush a little bit. However Karugo didn't seem to notice this and put a hand on her shoulder, which made her flinch a little as she felt a small spark coursing through her body, but was too distracted by the how close the blonde came to her face.

"It's not nice to ignore people you know? I know you like looking at Skaruke, but I wouldn't mind paying me a bit more attention."

"Karugo, please don't scare her, she just got here.", said the brunette to his pal while crossing his arms.

"Huh? Oh, sorry for being so direct Sakura.", said Karugo a he scratched his cheek in embarrassment. "I think I got a little ahead of myself."

"N-No worries..."

"But anyway, do you want to eat with us? It's not going to be an issue, right Skaruke?"

"That's right. It would be nice if we could share a meal together. What do you say Sakura?"

"Y-Yes, I accept..."

"Sweet! You should hurry and decide which flavour do you want fast though. They have plenty and the line is moving a little fast too."

She absentmindedly nodded as Karugo lead her back to the line. Sakura managed to hide it pretty well, but there were a million questions running through her head right now. "I am not in the mood for something sweeter right now.", replied Sakura in a neutral tone.

"Ever since you became my friend. If I am to be honest, everything was a lot brighter after I met you. It's true that I realized my feelings only recently, but the reason I didn't have eyes for any boys until now was because I was always looking at you."

"I've had a crush on you for a few years actually... After Hiruzen-sama took me in, the moments when we spent all of our time together were simply... the happiest I've ever felt ever since my brother left. I am sorry for not telling you this sooner... I just didn't have the courage up until now to say anything..."

When it came down to romance, the Uzumaki heiress gained a reasonable amount of knowledge during his training with Jiraiya, but never before was she in this situation. The boys and girls that flirted with him before did so only on the spur of the moment, but this time Ikaruka and Hikuge were telling her in the face their honest feelings. She didn't know whether to feel shocked or happy, since she also had a thing for both of her friends. Initially she was attracted only to Hikuge, finding their bonding time to be the moment when she began thinking of dating girls, especially after both of them hit puberty. But soon, Ikaruka's gentle disposition, care and his role in keeping her in line when it counted made her see him in a different light. Combined with the fact that they both were very close to him and even put up with her constant groping was just a few aspects of the many that made her have a lot of steamy dreams about them when she was sleeping.

Their minds underwent a few more changes to fit the new past, focusing on the few years they gained after the transformation began. Orochimaru didn't become Ikaruka's master, but rather Hikuge's. But her lack of desire to harm the village, her mentorship lasted only a year and a half, with the Sannin taking her as his pupil only to satisfy his curiosity regarding her abilities. Even if his plans never came to fruition and was waiting for a time to reemerge, he couldn't deny that he had a bit of fun training the "green-haired snake", which she also admitted was quite helpful to develop her skills before receiving help from Kakashi to further improve her skills. Ikaruka was instead trained by Tsunade in medical ninjutsu and a bit on taijutsu, while she continued her sword practice on her own, creating a variety of techniques that benefited her fighting style. She was also mentored by Hiruzen before his passing at the hands of the Akatsuki rather than Orochimaru, and under his guidance he managed to temper both his mind and his blade. As for Katruragi, while she was still tutored by Jiraiya, their time together was less dedicated to arguing with each other in regards to how hard she had to train, and more about her being introduced to the amazing world of admiring the woman's body, much to the joy of the sage. But that didn't mean they shied away from what she was promised, which was a grueling training regiment in which she learned how to better control her flow of chakra not just for the Rasengan or the Shadow Clone Jutsu, but also for being able to better use her greaves, which had the ability to channel her chakra into her legs, a gift from Jiraiya during her apprenticeship.

Seeing the blonde still frozen from their confession and how red she was, Hikuge chuckled a little before quickly moving behind Katruragi's back before she could figure out what happened, surprising her and Ikaruka as she held her from behind.

"W-What?! What are you doing?"

"Just what I thought I should do how much I care about you... Are you also in Ikaruka?", asked the greenette, which made the almost girl go stiff. "Like I said, I don't think it's fair to leave you out. And I am content to share, so don't worry."

After a few seconds of hesitation, the brunette steeled himself and also moved to hug his crush from the front.

"W-Wait... What are you...."

"D-Don't make me say it out loud... I just wanted to do this for a long time now..."

"Me too. Consider this a reward for your kindness... and payback for all the times we let you play with our bodies."

1153322222222222222322121121111112211111.content:
After a few more minutes of hugging, the trio finally broke apart. Hikage looked as stoned-faced as usual, but had a small blush over her cheeks, while Ikaruga's previous confidence seemed to have taken a step back and reverted to her slightly more reserved side, although she was also a bit red, both from embarrassment and happiness. As for Katsuragi, she looked quite sheepish and her cheeks were still crimson right now, although she was a bit more in control of her emotions this time than a few minutes ago. After scratching her cheek she turned to her friends.

"Well... that just happened... I have to admit, you really surprised me with this one. Especially you Ikaruga. Never thought you have it in you to act like that."

"T-That's... I-I was just going with the flow, and Hikage-san said it's fine to do a-and..."

"Easy there, I am not mad. Just surprised... I guess I had it coming after all the times I got a little too excited around you, but man it felt weird to be on the receiving end... I am not sure how to feel about that even now. Although... I admit it felt a little nice."

"So what's your answer? Are you accepting our feelings?", asked Hikage to which both her and Ikaruga looked at Katsuragi with anticipation. After a long sigh, and recovering a little from her shyness she replied back.

"I can't say "no". Why would I even say "no"? I've liked both of you for a long time so why wouldn't I be happy about it?" The answer was a bit unexpected, as neither girl thought the blonde would be so open with her response. "I mean, I've liked you Hikage for a long time. I like girly stuff, but because I was such a tomboy back then, I didn't really feel close to any girl before I met you. I don't remember because I thought you were so cool or that you didn't get mad at me easily, but I admit, I've fallen for you before my training... As for you Ikaruga, I admit, we had a rocky start at first, but after a while, spending time with you felt natural to me. It was almost like... I don't know, you were out there for me whenever I screwed up and you cared for me a lot, maybe even more than the Pervy Sage... I just thought you were this awesome girl with a sword that is strict but very caring and mature... and I kind of fell for you for quite a while..."

Katsuragi was slowly getting flustered again the more she prattled on, but the others didn't really care. Ikaruga was blushing as much as she had before, but was genuinely happy that her friend saw past the whole thing with being attractive only physically and liked her personality too. On the other hand, Hikage merely gave a nod and a small smile, glad that her feelings were reciprocated.

"T-That would be enough Katsuragi-san. I think you made your point clear."

"Yeah. You don't have to go on another half an hour telling us how much you like us. We got the message."

"Hey! I was trying to just say all that was on my mind okay?... Anyway, are you really okay with this? I mean, you did say you don't mind sharing a few minutes ago, but..."

"I still feel the same." That answer made the other two look at her in shock. "I am still your first love, and you see me as a girlfriend, so that's enough for me. And besides, I don't mind sharing you as long as I get the attention I want."

"I-Is that so? T-Then I also have no problem. Polygamous relationships are very rare, but they are accepted. I am happy you respect my feelings Katsuragi-san and I am not going to make you choose one of us if you like us both... A-And I am quite interested in seeing how this relationship would work."

Katsuragi looked stunned for a few seconds, which created an awkward silence that made the rest unsure what to ask. Suddenly, they found the blonde with her arms around their shoulders with the biggest smile she ever had.

"Best! Girlfirends! Ever!" That yell was loud enough to make Ikaruga and Hikage flinch a bit, but they couldn't help but join the Uzumaki girl in her excitement. "This is the best day ever! Two of the hottest girls in Konoha like me and want to date me? This calls the Ichiraku Secret Menu Ramen! I'll pay for you, don't worry! We can talk what else should we do after we eat!"

"Really? Are you only about ramen and beautiful girls? Oh well, I don't mind a free lunch."

"If you insist, than thank you for the meal Katsuragi-san... although I hope you won't desire to talk about naughty things or to grope us as we eat..."

Meanwhile, Jiraiya sneezed as he felt a chill run down his spine, a side effect from his having his mind rewritten like the rest of the world. "Did I catch a cold?... Or is this some sign that Katsuragi finally managed to score big? Haha, if she did, she will rub it in my face, I'm sure of it. Who knows, maybe that guy was right and I might get my wish and she will get the same experience as me when it comes down to women. And if she picked someone from her team? Hoh boy...", smirked the shinobi as he thought of Team 7 and how quirky the trio he and his former teammates trained. If there was one thing about those three that they all agreed on was that if they would somehow deepen their bond...

...then they would surely become invincible. Which given their new status as official girlfriends, they and the rest of the world will soon see how far they will get.

Naruto was ready to fight, but he had to know, "Sasuke, what you doing here?" "Can't I visit one of teammates." "You abandoned us remember, you're not supposed to be here." Naruto was wary of Sasuke. Sasuke seemed to be amused. "You're not as dumb as you used to be." Naruto gritted his teeth but remained composed. Sasuke caught Naruto off guard with his next statement,"You're coming with me Naruto." "What the hell? You should now I'm not going anywhere," Naruto refused. "You don't have a choice."

Sasuke threw a kunai at Naruto. Naruto deflected it, but the kunai exploded into a cloud of smoke. He inhaled the smoke and starting coughing. Naruto became disoriented and everything felt like it was spinning. He saw Sasuke smirking before he lost consciousness.

121.content: Naruto awoke in an unfamiliar place. The walls were decorated with the Uchiha clan symbol. He also saw what looked like a throne. He tried to move his limbs, but he couldn't move. Naruto struggled against his bindings, but he couldn't break free. Sasuke's voice broke the silence "It's useless you can't go anywhere. There are chakra suppression seals on those restraints." Naruto shouted, "Sasuke, you bastard let me go and I'll show what I can do to you. The Uchiha simply laughed, "I have other plans for you. Your going to see things my way soon enough." "I hate you, Ero-sennin was right about you," Naruto spat at him. Sasuke responded ominously, "you'll come to adore me, and you'll do it willingly."
121.title: Uchiha Hideout

1211.content:
Naruto glared at Sasuke and said, "what makes you think I'll join you." Sasuke explained, "You're in the middle of a sealing array that will change you to my liking. I wish I could take all the credit for it. Your clan really came up with incredible seals. I just needed to use my Sharingan on an Uzumaki, luckily I found one." "I won't let you get away with this." "Sorry Naruto, but by the end you will want this.

Sasuke activated the seal. Naruto saw each symbol light up. He could make out four of five symbols. Loyalty, wisdom, maturity, and humility. His mind settled on loyalty. He realized the seal would make him loyal to Sasuke, so he attempted on last effort to break free. He failed and the lines and symbols reached him.

Naruto screamed in agony as the seal altered his body. He was in so much pain that he failed to notice his changing voice. After the seal flashed and finished it's work Naruto fell unconscious. In the center of the room was a woman instead of a man. Sasuke appreciated her form and was very satisfied with the result. If the seal worked as it should, she would come to love and adore him.
1211.title: Transformation Begins

12111.content:
Naruto woke up in a traditional clan house. He groaned in discomfort. He was startled by the soft feminine sound of his voice. Naruto also felt new sensations. Naruto got out of bed to examine himself, but he stumbled because he was off balance. He got to the mirror and was stunned at his reflection. He saw a beautiful young woman. Her face had soft and gentle angles. Her eyes were large and round with dark irises. She was on the taller side about 5"6' in height, slim, and graceful in appearance. She had well endowed, but not ostentatious breasts. She had pale skin and long dark hair with full, straight bangs in a Hime cut. She was wearing a loosely secured Kimono and was bare-footed.

Naruto realized the woman was him, but she looked nothing like he used to. Even his whiskers were gone. He didn't know what to do.

Naruto turned when someone entered the room. She saw Sasuke, and was ready to scream and shout, but she couldn't muster the anger. She felt more confused than angry. She surprised herself when she asked in a polite and gentle voice, "Sasuke what did you do to me? Sasuke smirked and told her, "I see the first mental changes have settled in." "Forgive me, but would you care to offer an explanation?, she frowned at her question, it was too polite and formal.

Sasuke explained, "Your personality is changing. You're becoming a traditional woman. You will embody certain virtues. Loyalty, Domestic ability, Wisdom, Maturity, and Humility. Don't worry I haven't taken away everything. You can still use Chakra. It will be useful for me and the gift I gave you. No Uchiha is complete without a Sharingan. In short, you will be my devoted wife, and together we'll revive the Uchiha." His conviction took her off guard, she should've been terrified, but instead she felt arousal.
12111.title: Naruto Wakes Up

I realized I wasn't going to beat you conventionally so I found another way. Secondly, I really did respect you. Your transformation will be the means to restore my clan, and fulfill my need for a loyal and trustworthy individual."

She was stunned by his opinion of her, and she felt warmth at thought of fulfilling such a pivotal role. Her dream of becoming Hokage felt insignificant in comparison. Sasuke approached her and gently grabbed her face and their eyes met. A small part of her wanted to fight him and shout how wrong this was. Before she could focus on the small voice of resistance, Sasuke kissed her. Her resistance crumbled and she learned into the kiss. Her body shuddered at the intensity.

When they pulled away she decided that Sasuke would be her reason for living. Her new dream was to support his ambitions, and give him something to come back to. Her duties were clear she would act for the benefit of family and eventual clan, and she would obey her husband to be.

"Sasuke-kun would you call me Natsuko." "Why, Natsuko?" "I want to keep a piece of Naruto with me." Sasuke found he didn't want to refuse her. He realized he was falling hard for her.

12111111.content:
As a missing-nin it was difficult to find a place to be married. He decided to arrange a ceremony in Yugakure since they had no Shinobi. He and Natsuko would stay at a hotel until a ceremony was booked.

Sasuke went out to a local shrine to meet a priest. He arrived at the entrance to the Shrine, a large torii. He was certain Natsuko would be thrilled. A priest noticed his approach and he asked, "are you here for something shinobi-san?" Sasuke normally composed was nervous, "I would like to arrange a wedding as soon as possible." The priest smiled and told him, "you're in luck, a couple just cancelled yesterday we can have you married today." Sasuke assured him that he'd be back with Natsuko.

Sasuke made it back to the inn. A man was propositioning Natsuko. He decided to wait before acting. "Are you suggesting we share a bed? I must apologize, but I do not engage in prostitution." The man insisted, and grabbed her arm. "Unhand me sir before I am forced retaliate. Despite my appearance I am not defenseless." He laughed and proceeded to pull her. He was surprised to see the blade of a tanto in his side. "I did warn you sir, now unhand me before my intended becomes involved." "You lie." Sasuke made himself known, "she isn't lying." The man fled.

He told her, "Natsuko, I've arranged our wedding at the local shrine." Natsuko beamed and said. "I accept. It is my greatest desire."

[Later]
Sasuke was waiting in formal clothing, a kimono and hakama with the Uchiha crest. He was stunned when Natsuko appeared in in her white kimono. They both followed the priest into the next room. The priest offered a prayer and filled three cups with sake. They shared the three cups.

They left the temple as Husband and Wife. Sasuke and Natsuko Uchiha.

Natsuko asked Sasuke, "Anata, what will we do next?." Sasuke explained his intentions, "We can't stay in one place for long. People are looking for me. I also want information about a masked man. He calls himself Madara, but his abilities don't match the records. I intend to kill him and his abomination Zetsu." "How will you do that?", she wondered "I will seek out my contacts while you will enter Konoha." "Forgive me, Sasuke but you would be alone. I could not bear it," she desired to with her Husband and it pained her to leave his side.

"Natsuko, your safety is important to me. Besides that not the only reason, your duty will be to protect the Uchiha property and to be my spy." "I understand Husband, I will honor your wishes and I will devote myself to this task," she understood the importance of her role.

Sasuke kissed her, and then left on his mission. She shed a tear while seeing him leave, but it wasn't time for tears. She would focus on her mission. He was counting on her.

She approached the gates. She saw Izumo and Kotetsu sleeping on the job. Natsuko decided to make her presence known. She gently tapped them on their arms. "Shinobi-san, wake up." She managed to wake up Izumo. "What can I do for you?" Izumo pretended like he was awake the entire time. "Shinobi-san, if I was an enemy you would have lost your life." He blushed in embarrassment. "I request a meeting to see your Hokage." An ANBU appeared, "follow me."

Seeing Konoha with a new perspective was interesting. She was still fond of it, but her love was first. If Sasuke decided to act against Konoha she would follow him. Her loyalty had shifted to Sasuke and the Uchiha.

The ANBU had directed her to the Hokage's office. Tsunade became attentive with her curiosity piqued. She tried to hide her sake, but Natsuko had seen it. "Who would you be girl." Natsuko bowed deeply and introduced herself, "Tsunade-sama, I am Uchiha Natsuko." Tsunade's eyebrows rose dramatically. "My family decided to leave when I was child to avoid conflict, but recent circumstances have resulted in their deaths. Konoha is home to my clan so I decided to return. May I see the clan head?" Natsuko was aware the Uchiha were gone. She needed a good reason to get into Konoha and access the clan grounds without suspicion.

"Natsuko, I regret to inform you that the Uchiha were killed", said Tsunade solemnly. Natsuko gasped to sell her position. Tsunade-sama, may I see the clan grounds? Tsunade face hardened, "we've had imposters before so I need proof. Natsuko's eyes turned red indicating her active Sharingan.

Tsunade bought her story. "Natsuko, welcome to Konoha. We'll get you settled in." Natsuko smiled and bowed, "I appreciate your time, Tsunade-sama."
1211111111.title: Konoha

12111111111.content:
Natsuko was escorted by Shizune to Sasuke's apartment. "Natsuko-san, we've set you up in an apartment. officially it's still owned by the clan. Before he became a missing-nin, Sasuke Uchiha lived here." Natsuko said, "Shizune-san, I appreciate how welcoming you have been, to be honest I had some doubts about coming here." Shizune warned her. "Tsunade-sama has made sure your welcome, but there are some conditions you need to follow, obey our laws, and stay out of restricted areas. Suspicious acts will be investigated." Natsuko watched Shizune leave.

Natsuko entered the apartment and was eager to see Sasuke's home. It warmed her heart that she could tend to his belongings. The interior was spacious and had the bed at the center of the room. It had large windows that would let in the sun once she opened them. She decided to go to the balcony, it gave her a view of the Hokage of Konoha. As Naruto, she dreamed of having her face up there. Natsuko laughed to herself. She couldn't belief how much she had changed, becoming Hokage seemed like such a silly idea now.

Sasuke's apartment would suit her purposes nicely. She would begin her mission tomorrow.
12111111111.title: Sasuke's Apartment

121111111111.content:
Natsuko appeared on what appeared to be temple grounds. She walked to the largest building. The gate had the symbol for seal. She recognized it as Kyuubi's seal. She decided to enter.

She came face first with the fox. The Kyuubi snarled, "You've become one of them. The Uchiha have always been my enemy, and now you've become one of them. You even possess those accursed eyes." Natsuko sat down and responded, "Kyuubi-san, I have no knowledge of your history with my clan, but I will not let you disparage them." The fox scoffed, "I had gained some respect for you, but now you're an obedient wife to that Uchiha boy. "Did you forget what he did? Have you no pride?"

Natsuko answered, "I know that he made me his wife and that my duty is to him. I feel proud that I can bring life into this world, through me he shall have a family."

The fox roared, "I refuse to remain prisoner to a servant of the Uchiha. I will restore your mind or I will destroy you." The Kyuubi sent a wave of chakra toward Natsuko. She was unprepared and flew backward, and was stunned.
121111111111.title: During the night. Meeting Kyuubi.

1211111111112.content:
The foxes chakra entered Natsuko and she groaned in pain. The scenery around them became muted. The Kyuubi watched Natsuko sit up.
She looked at the fox and asked, She asked, "What happened? What did you do?" "I restored your mind brat, but the body is permanent." "Kyuubi we aren't friends, so why?" Kyuubi provided an explanation, "I hate humanity, but there are none I hate more than the Uchiha. As you were, you were loyal to that clan." Natsuko wanted to know, "Why do you hate them so much?" The fox told an abridged version of history, "Madara found me and used those eyes to control me. He used me to fight Hashirama against my will. I was content to stay away from humans. After their fight I was sealed away, and Madara was the catalyst."

"I'm sorry fox, I misjudged you, but I'm conflicted, as Natsuko I was happy. I would have the family I always wanted. Sasuke even opened himself up to me. As Naruto I've known hardship and ridicule, but I have friends. I could try to achieve by dream of being Hokage, but do I really want to now? Besides, I've always wanted to be Sasuke's friend, and I can't be closer to him than being his wife. The fox was angry, "He changed you. He wanted to use you, and you're seriously thinking about going back." "I don't know..."
1211111111112.title: Naruto's mind returns

12111111111121.content: I'm sorry fox, but I made a promise during the wedding and I keep my promises. The Kyuubi roared, "No, I won't let you." The foxes nine tails thrashed furiously and its claws nearly struck her. Natsuko shed a tear and looked at the fox with her Sharingan active. She commanded the fox to Sleep. She declared, "I am Uchiha Natsuko, Naruto is my past." The shrine regained its appearance, and a wind blew. She felt her mind change accordingly. She bowed and said, "I am deeply sorry Kyuubi-san, but please be assured that I will not abuse your power. I am grateful that you have given me a choice. I will not forget."
12111111111121.title: Decision 1

1442322112111222112121222121122112211211.content:
"Oh, what a day," the Hokage groaned as she slumped back onto the chair in her office. "And it's not even over yet."

"Well...things could always have been much worse," said Shizune with a sheepish grin. Tonton, who was in her arms, squealed in agreement. "At least only two people transformed, and they're still physically functional human beings."

"Things could have been better too," said Tsunade. "Naruto could have just turned the scroll in like he was supposed to. Or he could have just never found it in the first place. There's going to be a media shit-storm because of all this. If word gets out that Orochimaru still has his little tricks lying around, everyone will tear the whole village up looking for them. And even if it doesn't, I'm likely going to be lynched by the village's moral guardians for allowing a girl to run around naked 24-7. I'm frankly surprised I haven't had to personally pardon the brat from a wrongful arrest yet. Ahhhh, I'm going to feel the aftershocks of this disaster for weeks, and I had more important things to do."

"Like drink yourself stupid, sneak out to go gambling, and come back home with a lighter purse and fewer clothes on?" Shizune deadpanned.

Tsunade was taken aback. "No, I-I wasn't going to...no!"

"Whatever you say, Hokage-sama. Just remember: Tonton and I are watching you." And to demonstrate that, the little pig pointed a hoof at her eyes, and then thrust it in Tsunade's direction with a smug grunt.

"Fine, fine," said Tsunade with a huff. "How about you two leave while I try and prepare what I'll tell the press. They will be coming; I heard gossip about a certain blonde streaker on our way back from the hospital. And hopefully, I'll get some other non-gambling and alcohol-related stuff done in the process."

"We'll leave you to it then." And with that, Shizune and the pig were out of the room.

As soon as the door slid shut, Tsunade pulled the scroll out from a secure compartment in her desk. This thing had caused her no end of headaches, and it would likely cause a few more before the day was done. She honestly couldn't believe Naruto would be dumb enough to open it up like that.

Still, she couldn't help but consider the possible uses the scroll had. True, it was created by Orochimaru and used to conduct his cruel experiments, but that didn't mean it was automatically evil. She hated to admit it, but his wicked creation could indeed be used for more benevolent purposes.

Theoretically, it was possible the scroll could heal people who had been horribly disfigured or handicapped, just by simply giving them a more able-bodied form. It also had the potential to instantly turn a weak person into a strong one, an act that could rapidly bolster the Leaf's military capability, which it was sorely lacking ever since Orochimaru's attack. She also had to wonder if perhaps someone could effectively acquire a bloodline limit, like the Byakugan or Sharingan with this scroll. If so, then the Leaf could potentially expand on the number of bloodlimits in its arsenal by taking those that were originally exclusive to the other villages. The possibilities were endless, and the scientific part of the Hokage's mind couldn't help but want to tap into its potential.

That didn't mean the scroll should just be used willy-nilly, of course. It was very dangerous, needed to be kept under lock and key, and could only be used by a select few trusted individuals, just like every forbidden jutsu that was sealed up in the Hokage's Library. And more than that, it needed to be understood. Tsunade had every intention of studying the scroll, reverse-engineering it, and hopefully finding a way to undo its effects; she promised Naruko that much. But that would require a long period of experimentation herself, and anyone who so much as opened it would be vulnerable to its effects. Even herself.

It did the job most of the time, but if she expelled too much chakra at once, it would fade away. And there was only so much it could do; it made her look young, but it didn't actually make her young. Old age caught up to everyone eventually, Tsunade was well aware that she had reached her physical peak a long time ago, and she already shaved many years of her life away when she used the Creation Rebirth.

No. No, no, no! She couldn't just jump right into that. That would be abusing the scroll's powers for her own selfish gain, which is the kind of thing Orochimaru would do. And it was too reckless. Who knew what kind of long term effects there could be? Besides, she already had a couple of "guinea pigs" in Sasuke and Naruko, both of whom had undergone wildly different transformations. Even if Tsunade were to use the scroll to change herself, it would be much safer to put it off and observe the two new girls for at least a few months.

Between the both of them, Sasuke's permanent transformation was easier to grasp, especially since Tsunade was even able to give the newly-transformed girl a thorough medical examination. Overall, she was normal, just like the person she had turned into. All of her organs were working, she could mold chakra, perform techniques aside from the basic transformation, it looked like she had a fully working female reproductive system, and she could wear any sort of clothing she wanted.

“Because you won’t be fighting. I will personally deal with those vermin before it becomes a problem. As for maintaining a human form, the foolish Yondaime sealed half my power within himself before death. There exists techniques to bring the dead back, so I’ll overwhelm his spirit to recreate myself with a human body. It is child’s play to resume my full form at a moment’s notice, but I find the idea of tearing the foolish runts apart without using my full power,” he said as he radiated bloodlust, salivating at the idea of evening the score with that false Madara.

“And I will be doing what during this conflict?” Youko was slightly confused at her role.

“You’ll create a front, masquerading as a human businesswoman. That fool Gato from Wave gave me an idea, and the Yondaime’s knowledge is useful for espionage. You’ll present yourself as a capable investor, and eventually take over a business as a front. Preferably, it will be involved with shinobi, so you have a valid reason to interact and spy on them. The more information you acquire and relay to me, I will be able to undercut and sabotage the villages. Eventually, I will free my kin and ensure they cannot be sealed by creating physical tethers to prevent fuinjutsu from being effective,” he growled out.

“And what of the humans after? You know they won’t bow so easily,” she said while idly purring out smoke rings.

Kurama gave her a measured look. “They‘ll either bow, or risk perishing to the wrath of the bijuu. After that, I will not care what they do. Aside from the putrid Uchiha clan, they will be of no concern. Hell, you can rule over them if you wish!” cackled the amused demon.

“And what do I get in all this? It’s sounds very convenient for you, but I don’t receive anything tangible from this arrange,” Youko whined.

Annoyed, Kurama decided to play along with the vixen. “Very well. What do you wish for, in exchange for your ‘cooperation’ in my plans?” he asked, genuinely curious about what Youko could desire.

Posing while mock thinking, she made eye contact with Kurama. “Well, that’s easy Ku.Ra.Ma,” she said while emphasizing his name. “I want _______.”
1552322211121112.title: Casual friend with benefits

1552322211121113.content:
Taking in the sight of his new subordinate, Kurama smirked. “Glad to see you’ve adapted to your new form so quickly. Now then, it’s time to go over your role.”

“Of course, my lord. How may this humble servant serve you?” she inquired, bowing low enough to show a majority of her chest.

Wrapping nine tails around her frame, the Kyuubi caresses the still frame of Youko. “I find myself in need of subordinates to help deal with future threats. I am strong enough to deal with most threats with ease, but do not feel the need to out of boredom. So I am going to create a summoning contract, with myself leading the group,” he elaborated.

“And how will you create enough kit suns to justify such a contract?” she questioned, a slow excitement building up in her. ‘Looks like I’ll achieve my goal a lot sooner.’

Kurama smirked at the lust radiating off the vixen’s form. “Through you, of course. This plan would not simply exist without your creation Youko,” he crooned. Seeing Youko shivering in anticipation and excitement, he continued. “It’s time to fulfill your role. Now, close your eyes.”

Shutting her eyes in suspension, she felt a hand caress her chin. And a collar lock in place as cool leather settled around her neck. Opening her eyes in shock, a tag for with kanji for contract. “What’s the big idea? I thought I was the key piece in your plan?!” she yelled out in shock.

“Oh it’s quite simple, dear Youko. For twelve years, your body served as my seal and prison. So know, it’s only fair to use your body to repay the debt. You’ll serve as incentive for anyone wishing to sign the contract. And the best part, oh the best part. You’ll bear a kitsune every time someone wishes to sign or utilize the contract!”

Grabbing Youko by the waist, he sealed her into a fiery kiss. Red chakra swirled around the kitsune, making her feel numb as the world around her shrank into oblivion.

Outside

Kurama reformer in a swirl of red chakra, taking his surroundings. “To be free once more. Truly, a glorious day.”

Looking where Youko’s body last was, a large ornate scroll sat in it’s place. Opening the scroll, a picture of Youko standing seductively smoking her pipe occupied a large part of the top corner. Underneath, rows of blank columns occupied the rest of the space, awaiting the signatures of future summoners.

“Have fun Youko!” Kurama cackled as he sent the contract off to a potential summoner.

Who ends up with the scroll?
1552322211121113.title: Subordinate

15523222111211131.content:
Sasuke was training in one of Konoha’s many training fields when he heard a loud pop. Grabbing a kunai, he calls out to the direction of the disturbance. “Who’s there?” he called out in a warning.

Getting no response, Sasuke tossed the kunai into a nearby wooded area near the sound. Feeling no chakra spikes and hearing no movement, he went to see what made the noise. Pushing past a bush, he saw a large black scroll occupying a piece of land. Treading carefully, he picked up the scroll and moved it to the training ground.

“What the hell is a scroll doing in a random training ground?” he muttered. Deciding to take a risk, he unfurled the scroll slowly... to reveal a blank summoning contract. ‘An explicit one at that,’ he thought, seeing the picture of a busty kitsune woman smoking a pipe. “Might as well use it. The worst that happens is I decide the summons are worthless,” he said with a scoff.

Remembering the explanation about summoning contracts he received from Kakashi, he bit his thumb and signed the scroll. Copying the hand seals he’s seen Naruto done countless times, Sasuke used his still bloody palm to slam his hand onto the ground.

“Kuchiyose no Jutsu!”

*poof*

A feminine voice came out of the smoke created from the technique. “What the hell?”

What form does Youko take when summoned by Sasuke?
15523222111211131.title: Sasuke

15523222111211133.content: Who else could get the scroll?
15523222111211133.title: Someone else

15523222112.title: Gets caught (Bad end based of character)

1552322211233.content: The next two options are:
1552322211233.title: More

155232222.content: Naruto finds a snake fang.
155232222.title: Snake Fang

1552322221.content:
Naruto picked up the snake fang. He was startled when a drop of liquid fell from the fang. In his haste to drop the fang, it pierced his skin. Naruto felt an intense heat spread throughout his body. He cried out in pain as he felt his body change. His body reshaped itself into a new form. On the inside his bones and organs changed position. His hips widened, and his shoulders narrowed. His external flesh also changed as two mounds grew on his chest, and between his legs he could feel his genitals recede.

She gasped for air when the changes finished. She crawled toward the nearest body. Her reflection revealed several more changes. Her eyes were yellow with snake-like eyes. She also had a pair of fangs. She ran her tongue across them, and realized her tongue had also became more snake-like. Naruto knew only one person who had similar features as her face. She looked like Orochimaru, but she knew he lacked the fangs, and forked tongue. Naruto hissed in anger at the thought of having any similarity to him. Her anger caused her fangs to extend and leak venom. Her anger manifested differently. It was a cold anger different from her usual screams and shouts. She realized she found her previous self beneath contempt. She was such a child. Hokage, What a joke. Desiring to lead those cretins was pure stupidity.

She grabbed her forehead protector to throw it away, however she noticed a difference instead of a leaf it was a note. The irony amused her.
1552322221.title: Yes

Naruto ends up getting changed into various female characters. They can either be from the show, crossovers, and even OC's. Just use neat grammar and spelling. The only rule is Naruto has to be turn into a girl.

I will give out 150 gift points per actual chapter. Option chapters will be worth 75 gift points.
